Kate's just finishing putting on her bikini, and it seems like she was struggling to tie her top. You remember last time you were swimming, she bought a new suit that was a bit big for her chest, but now it seems the perfect fit. She adjusts both her top and bottom to fit right, and runs her hands over her chest, squeezing them slightly, then running her hands down to hold her belly from bellow. Kate looks pretty excited to go swimming, and it rubs off on her daughters, the mucus toads kicking happily inside. She just starts to rub her belly, smearing some gel around her belly button when Sarah's stomach gurgles again, more insistently. "Okay, okay, I get it.", she says and with some effort, pulls herself from a sitting position to a standing one. "Sorry, gotta go, Cindy's getting impatient. Seeya later!"

"Alright. Seeya, and hope dinner's good.", you say, and close the book just after she disappears. You put on the rest of your clothes over your swim trunks, grabbing a towel from the bathroom and throwing it into your bag. You come back downstairs as April picks herself up off the couch.

"Just in time.", she smiles, and waddles over to the kitchen, slipping on some oven mitts and pulling out the lasagna. "KATE! DINNER!", she calls, and you ask about dad. "Oh, he phoned earlier. He'll probably come home when we're at the pool."

The three of you eat dinner together, making idle chat, and the girls occasionally mention this and that about their experiences with pregnancy. Your mom makes points to Kate every now and then, giving advice about what to do for certain parts of pregnancy. She has been through two pregnancies, almost three, so Kate listens intently to what she says. April and Kate both go back for seconds, and you start
to clean the kitchen. When you're all done and your mom's got her bathing suit on, you all pile into your car. The girls are strapped in, belts crossed tightly over their bellies, Kate's pressed up against the glove box, and April's in the backseat pressed against the back of your own seat. Even with your seat pulled closer to the wheel to give her room, your can feel the strong kicks of the wererabbit girls against your back, excited to be so close to you. Then, you're off.
13121331212132322.title: Going for a dip after dinner

131213312121323222.content:
You drive straight for the pool, the three of you paying at the counter for your wristbands and heading to your respective changerooms.

It's been a habit of yours since you were little to put on your swimclothes before heading to the pool. It just makes it easier. All you have to do is pull off your shirt and pants and hop straight in, after a quick shower of course. You throw your clothes and shoes into a locker, paying the fee and clipping the key to your shorts before heading to the main area, book and towel in tow.

The pool's just as you remember. The smell of chlorine and water, slightly foggy air, and the general din of people calling and splashing around. As someone bounces off the diving board you realize it's the first time you've hit the pool this year, despite the hot summer and your like of swimming. "BOO!", a voice from behind calls and a pair of hands clasp your shoulders. You almost slip and fall on the wet tiles as
a belly bumps into your back soon after. "Whoah! Careful. Don't wanna take me down with you, huh?", your sister teases.

"You're the one who ran into me!", you pout and she wiggles behind you, some gel rubbing onto your back as the frog girls give little nudges to your spine.

"Yeah, but you don't have to get so freaked out~" Kate walks around to stand beside you and looks out over the water. She's wearing the same suit you watched her put on before: an orange-red bikini set which stands out well with her auburn hair. "Mmmhm", she stretches, arms raised up. "Good to see the place is still in business. I mean, pools don't really go out of business, but you get what I mean.", she nudges your elbow and waddles up to the kiddie pool closest to the changeroom entrance before sitting down, legs swishing and splashing in the water. Her hands rest on the top of her overswollen tummy, and Kate says, "Won't be long 'till these ones're swimming around in there, too.", and her eyes follow the path of some kids swimming back and forth in the shallows.

"Hey guys!", your mom calls, and she appears from the changerooms in her own white bikini set, though hers are considerably tighter than Kate's. The expansion of her hips and bum strain the fabric of the bikini bottom and her now-full breasts aren't fully cupped by her top anymore, but the important bits are still covered.

Kate stands up, partly leaning against you for help. "Geez mom, sure you didn't wanna stop by the store first for a new suit?", she calls.

"Nah, this one still fits just fine.", and to emphasize, she snaps the side of her top and starts absently rubbing her pregnant globe of a belly, looking around as the symbols by her navel flicker. "So guys, where to first?"
131213312121323222.title: Nope, Pool Can't Wait

choices: Check out the soul collection page purchase choices
1312133121213232221.content:
"Pool! I think I see a class going on.", Kate calls out, and she and April walk towards the main pool, hips swaying all the way.

"Alright!", you call back, heading for some chairs beside the pool. "I'll just hang outhere for now." Throwing your towel over the chair, you see Kate saw right: there is a class going on, but instead of what you figured: aquarobics or something, it's a pre-natal class. About 20-some women, plus Kate and April, are bobbing up and down in the water, holding foam barbells and doing various exercises. They seem to be a wide range of ages, most in their 20s-30s, but you spy a woman who looks to be in her 40s, and someone pretty young too: someone you recognize. You don't know her name, but you do recognize her from college. She's passed you in the halls a few times and you share the same English class. Though, you never really thought she was pregnant. But seeing her in a bathing suit like this, her skin exposed, there can't be any doubt. There's a bump in her abdomen that slopes forwards, looking like she's just past her first trimester. Recalling she had a twin sister, you look around trying to see if she's part of the crowd, or otherwise just swimming somewhere else. Looking for a while with no luck, your eyes scan the rest of the group, and comparatively they seem just under twice as big, most of them full term, and some even look overdue... or pregnant with multiples.

You pull your eyes away, vision drawn to the teacher. She's directing the group quite excitedly, and why not? She's actually not pregnant and can move with much greater mobility. Time to fix that...

But as soon as you recline and open the book, it starts to glow, and Sarah manifests beside you. "Oh hey, are there pregnant people already nearby?", she says while eagerly looking around.

"Uh, yeah... Why?", you ask, and the book begins to thrum in your hands, flipping by itself to a page labelled 'Soul Collection'. You watch on as the members of the pre-natal class stop their exercises and the instructor looks on curiously as they clutch their stomachs, moaning softly as they shrink and shrink, looking like they were never pregnant at all. Lights stream from their bodies, entering the book, and a couple even enter the book from the direction of the kiddie pool you just left. Looking back to the page, you see a counter rising until it settles on its final value:

Souls Collected 39

Various checkboxes are written in columns underneath, with small descriptions and costs. "I know it seems kinda morbid...but all the energy this book has to use doesn't come free. It doesn't hurt anyone at all, and if it makes you feel any better, if you reimpregnate one of them with
a monster girl, they retain the personalities and minor appearance differences they would have had regularly... well, unless they were baby boys. Then they've got the one major difference.", and Sarah gives you a wink. "And you can always choose not to do it."

You felt kinda bad initially, but Sarah's description kinda puts you at ease. You also see the group continuing the class, albeit now as an aquarobics class, with Kate and April being the only pregnant participants.

She's still excitedly directing the class, unaware of their recent changes and equally oblivious for the changes that are about to affect her.

Well, you think, it only feels appropriate to give a swimming instructor something a bit more aquatic. You go to the index, finding a couple choices that fit the bill.

Sahuagin - A quiet, somewhat solemn species which keep to themselves, but pursue things they're interested in with great passion. Looks mostly human but with webbed appendages and scaled skin. Part of the Kappa family.

Sea Slime - Jellyfish-like slimes typically found in the ocean, and appear to be wearing dresses. Born without their bells, but acquire them as they mature and reproduce, themselves. Members of the slime family.

Cancer - Crablike monsters obsessed with cleanliness and purity. Most of their emotions are expressed through their tauric lower body, and often through dance. Tauric family.

They travel towards the group of bouncing swimmers and you lean back to watch the show.

They brush past some of the women holding foam barbells and finally reach the instructor. She pauses mid-sentence, her face blanching in surprise. "Oh, sorry guys!", she calls. "Shoulda waited longer before hopping in. Must be some cramps!" Her students nod understandingly,
some chuckling at her explanation as her hands clutch at her waist. She moans lightly, and you get the idea things are about to kick off.

You've got the perfect viewing angle from the side as the front of her suit starts to bulge out, like she's got a full orange poking out from inside her belly. Your focus is suddenly taken away from her growing midriff though, as her hips and rear gain just a bit of extra curve, going from
smooth but toned to now having a soft-looking tush and hips that are just about into the motherly threshold. As these changes occur, she lets out a "Meep!" when her growing proportions caused her swimsuit to wedge itself in her rear. Clearly embarrassed, she pulled the suit free, trying to straighten it out to cover her new assets.

The task is made all the more difficult as her belly continues to grow, slowing as it becomes a distinctly huggable baby bump, just a week or so into her third trimester. Her suit is pulled taut against her skin, bellybutton sticking out prominently, and the material now stretched thin
enough that even from where you're sitting, you see a single bluish light under her navel gently pulsing.

Panting, exhausted, the instructor rubs the stretched suit around her tummy, feeling the motions of the happily squirming and tumbling sahuagin inside, and playfully presses and flicks her popped bellybutton in return. She puts her hands on the small of her back, leaning back and straightening out before noticing the tightness of the suit makes her still-B-cup chest a bit more obvious too, and as a result,
proudly displaying the erect nipples underneath. Blushing hotly she sinks into the water, down to her neck as a few of the more playful students make jokes about their instructor. "Ha ha.", she says, "Hilarious. You'll know what it's like too when you have kids, Cassidy!" and casts a sour, but well-spirited glare in Cassidy's direction.

You didn't really think of it, but you guess the class is reversed now. They were all pregnant and the instructor wasn't, but now it's the opposite. "Hmm...", Sarah ponders, "Does she look a little big to you? I mean, asides from-", she traces a path with her hands in a semicircle in front of her, following the curve of her belly. "-I mean like, big for 26 weeks with just one baby." You know pregnant female anatomy pretty well, being more than familiar and interested in pregnancy and everything it entails even before getting this book, but you wouldn't have really said anything if Sarah didn't point it out. "Yeah... I'd say she's about an inch to two inches too big..."

You take a second glace at the instructor, figuring the tight suit would probably make her look smaller, and you start to see what Sarah means. Suddenly, she snaps her fingers. "Got it!", she announces, and a big kick appears on Sarah's belly on the side closest to you, as if in
congratulation. "Must be extra amniotic fluid, for her little girl to swim around in." You look back and nod at the appraisal, the explanation making sense to you. Relaxing back in your chair again, you think of what to do next.

131213312121323222121121313.content:
You shrug and grin. You're just no good with patience. You wanna see her, belly fully rounded and waddling to class, hands cradling her overswollen womb as the baby inside her playfully kicks... Getting back to the matter at hand so your daydreams don't run away with you, you finish mumbling the chant, and a purplish light blossoms forth from the book in the shape of a moth. It flutters unsteadily for a moment, bouncing in the air and turning in circles as it lazily travels towards the blonde girl.

The class has ended between when you started chanting and now - guess you guys arrived just as the class was winding down - and you're surprised to find your classmate talking with Kate and your mom. The moth lands on her shoulder, seeming to rest for a bit as the trio talk with each other about the class. They look like they've struck it off, the three talking like they always come to this class and have known each other forever. Watching eagerly, you see the light moth flutter down off her shoulder and into the water, unaffected by the change in medium.

Her face seems to screw up for a moment, and she purses her lips, placing a hand on her stomach. April reaches out her hand and places it on her shoulder, asking if she's okay. Your classmate nods in response, still looking down into the water. "I think so... I feel... I feel kinda funny though."

Kate comes a bit closer, but not close enough to touch her, "You don't look so hot right now, either. Do you want us to help you out?"

She shakes her head, just as her growth starts to begin. At first, it's not terribly visible, and from where you're seeing, you actually can't see anything at all. You don't have long to wait, though, because you see a pudge start to form in her lower abdomen, just below the water. Her gut grows, and she starts to squat in the water, hands on her middle. The growth is fairly uniform until it looks like her womb has a large orange, or small melon in it. At this point, her eyes shoot open when her fingers begin to separate, pushed apart by the growth in her womb, and she coos and moans as her tummy balloons outwards and rapidly approaches full term. "Oh my god... I'm... oh god I'm ooh... I can't be pre-", she pants out, but is interrupted as her belly reaches its full capacity and her bellybutton pops out, pushing up her index finger.

Blinking a few times, she looks to April and Kate, and the spots where their bellies touched hers. "Hmm? You're what, sweetie?", April asks, looking a bit concerned.

"I'm... ah, I'm... Ac-actually, I don't know what I was going to uh... say...", she trails off, hands still pressed tightly into her now-fully grown, hugely rounded pregnant belly.

Kate pats her tummy. "Well don't worry us, Silly! You had me going for a second there...", she smiles warmly, and sinks into the water a bit, her hands waving back and forth.

The three bob and chat for a little longer before April stands up, the bottom of her belly just a few inches underwater. "Well gals, I don't know about you, but I'm gonna hit the hot tub. My back is killing me!"

"Oh-oh!... you're pretty b-big. How ah... far along are you?...", your classmate asks, seeming significantly more
quiet, shy, even reclusive compared to before, during the class.

"Hmmm... somewhere around 37, 38 weeks. It's the twins that make me this big.", April grins, leaning back a little to accentuate the size and curve of her bump.

Kate grins even more than April when she stands up, her girth beating her mom's, even on Kate's smaller frame, and looking to dwarf your classmate's, too. "Oh yeah?", she asks, winking at your classmate. "About the same, but with triplets."

"Woooah...", your classmate gapes at Kate's size before standing up herself, "I'm j-just having one...", she lays a hand on her tummy, as the baby inside makes a visible kick on its surface. "I'm in the... in the latter half of 30 we-weeks.", she smiles at April, and you see under her popped bellybutton is a small, gently pulsing lavender symbol that looks like a butterfly, but with slightly ragged wings and feather-duster antennae. She seems to be a bit self-conscious, because she immediately sinks back into the water, splashing and sending out a series of waves. With just her head above the water, she follows behind April and Kate, who're both walking to the edge of the pool as your classmate swims behind them.

The trio make their way to the edge of the pool and pull themselves out, one by one, Kate clearly having the hardest time getting out. Together, they waddle to the hot tub, and your classmate spends most of her time staring down at the tile and her belly. When they arrive, they slink in one by one, cooing softly as they lie against the walls, jets gently massaging their backs, sore from carrying the weight of their bellies, and the extra weight from their filled out and full breasts.

1312133121213232221211213133.content:
You feel you've done enough for the night. Time to relax and enjoy yourself. Wrapping the book in a towel, you saunter over to the hot tub. and place the bundle by the water's edge. "Heya, Bart!", April calls, "Finally decided to take a break from studying?", and she grins playfully.

You purse your lips, looking down at the striped towel by your feet when you remember what the book looks like to other people. "Oh! Yeah. Just wanted to brush up on one thing before I get a chance to relax." You dip a foot into the water, sliding down into the pool between Kate and your classmate. The water is much hotter than you thought, almost to the point of being uncomfortable, but you quickly get used to it, and recline in the bubbling water. Kate reaches an arm around her back, twisting and opening a jet, which pounds directly into your spine. It's pretty comfortable actually, if a little itchy.

"Uh... um... hi... You're Bart?", you hear, and turn to your left at your blonde classmate, reclining against the edge of the tub and quietly rubbing her tummy. Part of the mound is above the water, and occasionally she pours a handful of water over it. "I re-recognized you from... from school, a-and I heard your name from K-Kate..." She looks down, looking for whatever reason embarrassed and blushing furiously.

"Yup, that's me.", you reply, "I remember you from... English class, right?" You look at her expression, but she can't seem to meet your eyes. In response to this, your gaze drifts downwards towards her tummy. "Can I feel?", you ask and reach a hand over preemptively, already guessing the response.

She nods sheepishly and sits up straighter, her leg brushing yours. Your hand touches the wet surface, warm from both the water and from her own body heat, and she responds with some intense blushing. "I'm... my name is L-Lucy.", she manages to say before her little bundle of joy wakes up. While normally she'd just squirm to let her mother know she's awake, the combination of feeling you there and your touch on the surface of her mother's skin drives the mothgirl into a frenzy. You can see the glowing flickers shining brightly through the frothy water even before you feel the first kick against your palm. "Ah!", Lucy jumps, placing her hand reflexively on your own in the location of the kick but then raises it quickly, embarrassed. "Oh!... Wo-whoa"

Bumps litter the surface of Lucy's belly, her unborn daughter clearly more than excited to have her daddy nearby. The thought that it must be inconvenient to have such mischievous children passes your mind for a moment, leaving you empathetic to Lucy's sudden discomfort, but you don't have much time to consider it as she stands up suddenly and sends waves across the hot tub. "I... I have to go now!", Lucy says in a panic, struggling to leave by the edge of the pool. Kate calls, wondering what's wrong but it falls on deaf ears, Lucy is already walking hurriedly across the tiled floor, cradling the underside of her belly and dripping water.

"Huh.", Kate smirks, "Wonder what that's about.", and she looks to you and April for input.

"Maybe she had somewhere to be and forgot?", April replied.

You shrug. Not a clue. Maybe she had to use the bathroom?

Kate shakes her head. "Seemed a bit urgent for that. I mean, I've had my share of close calls because of these guys-", she taps her belly and smears the gel coating,"-but you can tell, ya' know?"

The three of you continue to look in the direction of the women's change room for a while before going back to relaxing. Whatever. You can ask her what was up when you see her at school tomorrow. Though, you have a pretty good idea why she had to run. Turning over, you flip open the book to the page on mothgirls to double-check some of the side-effects of a pregnancy. You nod, satisfied that that was probably the explanation.

"Ahhhh, I'm done for the day.", April mumbles. She draws herself out of the water, sitting on the hot tub's edge and swinging her legs around. "Geez Bart, you shouldn't take your studying so seriously. Have some fun once in a while."

"Eh, let bro do what he wants. He'll be back to his usual self soon." It's at this comment that you look up to see your mom and sister already walking quite a ways away. "Hey, you're driving, you coming or what?", Kate teases, and you're soon following closely after.

Looking over, the red glow of your alarm clock reads "11:23pm". Geez, you really should have gone to bed sooner and read a bit in the morning. With a sigh, you roll over, pulling the covers and staring at the wall... But you can't resist another check before bed.

Curiosity gets the better of you as the urge strikes to see how Lucy is. You think back on how she was earlier today, and figure you've got plenty of time to check up on April and Kate anytime you want. Turning to the view tab, you tap on her entry and the page changes to show Lucy sitting on her bed.

MOTHER: Lucy Thorn
AGE: 18
BLOOD TYPE: B+
PREGNANCY: Single Mothgirl
CURRENTLY: Getting ready for bed

The display in the corner is the same as ever, with one distinct change. The addition of a timer:


MOTHGIRL PREGNANCY: 97.44%
TIME: 4 Days 20 Hours 23 Minutes 56 Seconds Until: Childbirth


As you watch, the timer continues to tick down - 55...54...53..., and you can't help but get excited at the idea. Doing a bit of mental math, you find out she's going to give birth this saturday. Man, she must really be close... you smile, thinking of watching her during her last few days in class. You're drawn away from your reverie by the sound of a soft squelching noise. Your cheeks burn red for a moment, but looking back to the main section of the page, Lucy is sitting on her bed and squeezing a bottle of lotion into her palm.

She flopped backwards onto the bed, swinging her legs over, and scooching her bum to lie in the center as the springs creak a little beneath her. Bunching up her lavender nightgown with her free hand, her belly is exposed to the air, and you take in her appearance. She must have gotten the nightgown before coming home from the pool, or borrowed it from someone (her mother probably), as it's clearly maternal wear and a bit big on her, even for a nightgown. It's bunched up to her chest, and it doesn't look like she's wearing a bra, the undersides of her petite breasts visible underneath the pile of fabric. Her panties ride high on her hips and seem to match the dress, a soft purplish color, but it's largely obscured by her belly - hidden in its shadow. And looking at her belly, a dark brown line runs from just under her chest and down through her belly button and ending just before her groin.

Her nightgown out of the way, Lucy laid her right hand onto the surface of her belly and a healthy dollop of lotion squeezed out from her fingers. She slowly rubbed in circles, smearing the cream onto her skin and drawing with her finger. She drew various shapes and pictures before wiping across and rubbing it into her skin. She reached back out towards her nightstand, fingertips brushing against the bottle of lotion, clearly not feeling like moving. A little bit more reaching and the bottle tipped over onto its side where she could reach it. Grabbing the bottle, Lucy held it above her tummy, squeezing a small puddle onto her belly button. Replacing the bottle on the table, she went back to drawing and rubbing, until the pile was used up, leaving her skin looking soft, smooth, and slightly glossy

Her hands were centered on the peak of her mound now, index finger squishing and rubbing her popped bellybutton as she softly sighed. With a sudden movement, she reached up to her chin and flung the nightdress down over her body, smoothing it out as it settled, pulling at the sheet with her hands and straightening it until it hugged her form tightly, belly silhouetted perfectly and the bump of her bellybutton protruding out. She poked it again, giggling as it popped right back up. With a bit of trouble, she pulled the sheets up from
around her knees and up to her chin before closing her eyes and going to sleep.

You were about to call it a night too, but decided to check on her daughter. Tapping the X-Ray button, you could see through the sheets, into her womb, at the curled up little mothgirl within. You didn't want to watch too long, in case she caught on, got excited, and woke Lucy up, but you figure she was probably tuckered out from her outburst earlier today. You see she was smaller wings than you'd thought, based on the picture on the mothgirl page, as they barely extend past her shoulder blades, and her antennae are laid back and flat to her head. The thought "cute little thing" passes your mind, and you smile warmly before yawning and leaving the page.
13121331212132322212112131332313.title: Test Drive

131213312121323222121121313323132.content:
Your alarm is an unwelcome start to the day - as usual. With a groan, you roll out of bed and onto your feet, stumbling for a moment before grabbing a handful of clothes from your closet and getting to the bathroom. The door's locked, and you check your watch: 6:07am... You rub your face and sigh before leaning against the wall and closing your eyes. Guess you'll have breakfast first. Throwing your clothes in a heap by the door, you walk downstairs, greeted by your mom.

"Hey sweetie, sleep well? Breakfast is french toast!"

Well, at least there's one good thing about this morning. With a smirk you grab a few pieces of french toast off a communal plate, pouring on a bit of maple syrup and powdered sugar. As you go to the fridge to grab some juice, you ask, "Dad gone?"

"Yup, left early. Can you get the smoked salmon out from the fridge?"

Initially, you just think she's going to have something other than french toast for breakfast, but you can't helping grimacing as April lays a slice of smoked salmon across a piece she'd set aside, adding some salt, and pouring maple syrup on top. "Geez, gross...", you tease.

"Hey, when you've got some of these.", she pats her tummy, just in time for a kick to bulge out. "Then you can say my cravings are weird.", and to emphasize the point she stares you dead in the eyes before taking another bite.

"How're the girls this morning?", you ask.

"They haven't stopped since last night! They kept waking me up, and they still haven't stopped.", she says, walking towards you. As she does, April lifts her shirt up, exposing her belly. Sure enough, the bunny symbols just under her navel are flashing fairly excitedly and no more than a few moments can pass before a kick or a punch sweeps its way across her tummy.

"Wow...", you gasp, never seeing or hearing of so much movement. "You think they're, you know, upset or something?"

April just smiles. "No sweetie, they're just energetic. Probably just excited to get out.", and giving a wink, she goes back to cooking.

"Shower's free.", Kate calls, and you can hear her walking down the stairs behind you. As she enters, she flicks her still-wet hair and walks up to the stove. "Ugh, salmon and french toast?!", she asks in mock disgust.

"That's what I said!" The words are barely out of your mouth before Kate peels open a banana, taking a bite and throwing a piece of salmon in her mouth. Kate grins at you and all you can do is roll your eyes.

"How're the kids treating you this morning?", April asks.

"Can't complain. They always get active in the water, though. The droplets are probably like a massage." She leans back, accentuating her belly, and her sweater starts to sneak up her middle, but gets stuck on her belly button.

Seeing the two of them side by side, you realize just how big Kate is. She's shorter than your mom, but even still, carrying triplets has her looking far bigger... You finish your glass of juice and toss the dishes in the sink, going upstairs to shower and get ready for the day. When you get out, you walk straight into Kate, the two of you stumbling back into the wall, pressed against each other.

"Woah! I came up here to get you, but it wasn't THAT urgent.", she chuckles, but makes no attempt to move. The huge mass that is her pregnant belly is pressed straight into you and you feel the squirming inside, only now, more animated by your closeness.

"Sorry. Time to go?", you ask, already on the way to grab your bag from your room.

"Yup. See you in the car..."

Whose perspective will the day be from?
131213312121323222121121313323132.title: The Next Morning

1312133121213232221211213133231321.content:
You're in a bit of a hurry, the traffic being rougher than you thought it would be, but you make it to class on time. School is the usual: get to class, scramble to take notes, then leave without being sure you learned anything. But on the bright side, you had one thing to look forward to: English class.

You planned to wait by the door until class was about to start, but as you reach the Arts and Theater building you enter to see Lucy at the stairs, talking with her sister. When you get closer, you catch her eye and wave hello. As if flipping a switch, she goes from happily chatting with her sister to being shy and skittish when she sees you. "Is that him?...from yesterday?", you can hear her sister ask, and Lucy nods
in response.

"Hey!", you say, getting closer. "How's it going Lucy? You kind of ran off a bit suddenly yesterday, so..."

Lucy's sister shoots her a sly, inquiring glance, and Lucy just blushes and avoids eye contact. "I'm... I'm fine. Y-you?..." She was looking pretty stylish yesterday at the pool but today she's just wearing an oversized hoodie, and buries her hands in its pocket, cradling her belly.

Elbowing her suddenly reclusive sister, the other twin steps forwards, "Heya. I'm Stefanie. Everyone calls me Stef, though. I guess you've already met Lucy? She talked about you quite a bit yesterday~" At this, Lucy elbows Stefanie back. She ignores it, continuing, "She said she met your family, and was VERY happy to meet you. Sure you wanna get involved with someone who's... you know...", and she rubs her hand down her belly. It seems kind of mean spirited, but you get the sense that Stefanie's just teasing, and actually happy that her sister's getting some attention, and found someone she's interested in.

The three of you make to go upstairs, Lucy trailing a bit, but you and Stefanie climb a bit slower, to walk along with her, and enter the lecture room just as the prof moves to close the doors. You make the executive decision to sit at the back, at the top of the lecture hall, instead of walking down to one of the middle rows, so Lucy doesn't have to go up and down the stairs again. Taking a seat at one of the benches on the back, Lucy takes up a seat right beside you, and Stef to the right of her. The class is fairly full as usual, but the last few rows are sparse, leaving you and the twins with quite a bit of space.
1312133121213232221211213133231321.title: At School

choices: Yeah, another class to go to...
Not really. English is my last class
Yeah, have to get home right now...
13121331212132322212112131332313212.content:
You're mostly just trying to focus on class, paying attention to what the prof. says, and making notes on this and that. Mostly literary devices and book interpretations. Occasionally, you do look out of the corner of your eye at the twins. Stefanie is doing much the same thing as you, but checking her phone every so often. You don't blame her. If you had a deck of cards, you'd probably be playing solitaire. As for Lucy, she was trying to take notes for a bit, but her tummy kept her from getting too close to the table, and stretching her arm to write notes was probably pretty tiring. She was actually sitting pretty close to you, now that you noticed.

Turning back to your note page, you feel someone reaching into your lap, touching your right hand. You don't look up, knowing it's Lucy, and you feel her slowly, quietly, slip your hand under her hoodie. She holds the bottom of the hoodie over your hand, her own hands on top, pressing your hand to her skin. You leave it there, still for a moment, then rub one finger in a circle. Lucy smiles, then her unborn child starts to join in.
You feel the skin beneath your hand tremble a bit, and Lucy holds your hand tighter to her. After a few false starts, the mothgirl starts kicking in earnest, mostly at or near your hand. It's pretty fun, feeling her wiggle under your hand, and then punching, like giving a high-5, or keeping her hand stuck out, the bump in the skin moving around your palm.

Before you even know it, class is over, people shuffling out of their chairs and rows, filing towards the exits. The dazed and contented grin on Lucy's face is quick to leave, and she rapidly pushes away your hand and adjusts her hoodie. She stands up more quickly than you'd expect at her size, blushing furiously and gathering her things. "Hey, uh... did you... a-are you doing anything right now?", she asks?
13121331212132322212112131332313212.title: But, during class...

131213312121323222121121313323132122.content:
"O-okay. Did you want to come... over to our place? I m-mean, only if you want to..."

"Sure.", you say. It's not like you had any homework to do. Might as well get to know the twins better. "Oh! But I've got to pick my little sister up from school first."

"Oh yeah, Kate...", Lucy says softly, and smiling. "Well, here...", she takes a pen and pack of sticky notes out of her bag, scribbling something down. "The top one's o-our address. The bottom one is, ah, my number..." The note is thrust into your hands and she grabs a hold of Stefanie, before hurrying away down the hall as fast as she can. You can't help but shrug at her reaction, and head towards the parkade to get your car.

You pick Kate up, dropping her off at home, and letting your mom know you'll be out until later tonight, and probably won't be home for dinner. She nods her approval, and as your turn to leave, you catch a harsh murmur from Kate: "Luuuucy~" and hear her and mom both chuckling as you go.

When you eventually DO make it to the... you check the note again. "Thorn" household, it's a bit more than you expected. They live in the more well-off part of town, in not quite a mansion, but certainly a large house, with stone facade and a well-maintained lawn and garden. You almost don't want to walk up, in case this is the wrong place and they sic the dogs on you, but you check the note again and walk up anyways, knocking on the door three times.

"It's open, come in!", you hear. and Stefanie pokes her head out of the kitchen. "Lucy's just in the den", she says, going back into the kitchen and returning with a sandwich. "If you need anything, just ask her.", Stefanie says as she walking up a spiral staircase in the entry hall, you assume up to her room.

Looking around the main floor, you don't see anything resembling a living room, as such, so you opt to check the basement. It's the right decision, as you can hear some commotion as you descend the stairs, like from a TV. There's two doors at the foot of the stairs, but you only hear noise from one, on the right. You open it, and are met by the sight of Lucy, wrapped in a large star-patterned blanket, sitting in the center of a couch and watching the TV. "Oh! S-sorry..", she says, wrapping the blanket tighter around her, "I didn't h-hear you come in, an-and
I didn't know when you'd be here..."

"No worries!", you say, walking towards the couch and turning to see the screen. "What're you watching?"

"It's, ah, it's called 'Burnt'. It's about a washed up chef in Britain, running a r-restaurant.", Lucy says, and noticing how much of the couch she's taking up, she starts to wiggle over to one side, freeing some space for you to sit, and you toss your backpack to the side before doing so. The movie is better than you expected, but still probably not something you'd watch on your own, by choice. "So... you've got quite the house...", you mention, trying to make small talk.

"Y-yeah...", Lucy says, "Our d-dad was a pretty good day trader... or, um, lucky...", she pauses for a while, like she's trying to put the thought together. "They're actua- well, they're not here right now. Gone for a m-month... or two. Business and vacation..."

"Ah", you let it sink in for a bit. "So they won't be here for...", you point towards her.

"Hmm?...", she looks around for a moment, over her shoulder to a leather recliner, a fireplace in front of her, to the blanket wrapped around her. "Oh!...yeah...", she says, wrapping her hands around her gravid middle. "No... it'll just be us...well, sis too, I guess." Lucy looks somewhat forlorn, and you can't help but try to make her feel a bit better.

"Hey, you know, if Stefanie can't help, or if you're getting worried - about anything - you could always call me."

"Wh-what? Don't you think that's a li-little soon? I mean, you don't even know-"

"No, don't worry about it. Just seemed like you needed a shoulder to lean on. Besides, we've seen each other around campus, and always have class together. It just took us a while to introduce ourselves."

She pauses again, before looking down, "...alright", she smiles and seems to blush. "...Thanks."

You pull out your phone, having typed her number in before, you send a text to her:

Bart:
Hey, how's it going? This is my number, so
call or text if you need anything, okay?

Lucy:
Hey Bart! Will do... Thanks again.
;)


She grins and wiggles in place, hugging the blankets to her chest, and you both share a moment of silence.

"...We wouldn't even be talking... I've been working more on the potato truffle veloute. I think we should put it on the menu tomorrow, as a sort of modern take on sole bonne femme. Michelin loves it when you celebrate French cuisine..."

...well, almost silence - the TV fills the void. "Hey... hey Bart.", Lucy whispers.

"Hmm?"

"She's awake..."

"She is?"

In response, Lucy moves the blanket, showing that she was actually sitting cross-legged on the couch, and in her nightgown to boot - the same one from last night. "Sorry, I wasn't s-sure if you were actually coming...", she blushes, "because, it's just me..."

You shake your head. "Why wouldn't I?", you ask, and she doesn't meet your gaze.

"Anyways.", she says suddenly, and lays both her hands on top of the shelf of her belly, drumming gently. "You can feel, or listen if you want...", she pauses, adding softly, barely audible, "...whenever you want..."
131213312121323222121121313323132122.title: Not really. English is my last class

choices: Check someone's view tab in the book
1312133121213232221211213133231321222.content:
Lucy swivels her hips, and swings her legs onto the couch and lies them on your lap. You turn to face her, spreading her legs to either side and leaning in to rest your head on her tummy. You see the purplish moth sigil, pulsing pretty brightly through the fabric, but in a fairly relaxed rhythm, and you lay your head just beside it with your hands on either side of your head. Lucy points to a spot on the right side of her tummy, just above her navel. "Right here.", she whispers, and you move your left hand to cover the spot. She then starts hiking up her nightgown, sliding it out form under your face and leaving you pressed against the bare skin of her abdomen. It smells just like coconut, or maybe pina colada, and you assume that's the lotion from last night.

Just then, you hear a gurgle, and a bump near your hand. "Ooh~", Lucy murmurs, and you giggle, giving a little rub close to where she kicked. The two of you go silent again, and you can hear subtle noises, even thinking that you heard a little heartbeat a few times. *swush* *thump*, you can hear the little baby mothgirl squirming and kicking, only proving further that she was ready to come out. You brush your thumb over her bellybutton, flicking it back and forth. There's a reaction almost instantly, the sigil glowing brighter and the baby moving more rapidly, stretching out with all limbs and moving around, a couple bumps moving around the surface of Lucy's tummy and making her gasp. You can even feel her skin growing warmer. Suddenly, there's a kick right in your chest and probably around her bladder as Lucy lets out an "Eep!"

"Bart, g-get off!", she says, "I have to go!"

You sit up in surprise, and she tries to stand up, falling back down into the couch, but tries again and starts to waddle off around the corner. You hear a door open and shut, and a toilet seat being raised. You were surprised for a moment, worried that she was going into labor early or something, but are relieved that it was just the little girl being mischievous. You reach over the edge of the couch and unzip your backpack to pull out your book.

You mostly just read up on mothgirls for a bit -

Mothgirls
Bug type monster girl, of the papillon family

Well-known matchmakers in the scope of demi-humans, mothgirls often use their scales as an aphrodisiac and enhancer of both fertility and virility, and as such their services are also sought after for medical reasons. One of the more gentle races, mothgirls are known for being fairly honest and open in their thoughts, even if this can get them in trouble. As an additional point of precaution: both mothers and their children are sensitive to light, getting into a heightened state of excitability and receptivity when in light-intensive areas.

The page goes on about traits, appearances, and more on mothgirls in general. You fiddle with the display in the corner, seeing what twin mothgirls would look like aaaat... how about 20 weeks? You watch as the figure in the corner begins to grow, up to where she looks clearly pregnant, and with two small still-developing figures within.

*Sigh* Lucy's been in there for a bit, hasn't she?
1312133121213232221211213133231321222.title: Getting Closer

13121331212132322212112131332313212222.content:
You figure you probably know what Lucy's up to at this point, and don't want to be rude about it, so you go to check on Kate.

MOTHER: Kate Cannon
AGE: 16
BLOOD TYPE: O+
PREGNANCY: Triplet Mucus Toads
CURRENTLY: doing homework
MUCUS TOAD PREGNANCY: 95.89%
TIME: 9 Days 5 Hours 34 Minutes 40 Seconds Until: Childbirth

Kate's sitting at her desk, pencil in hand and a chemistry assignment spread out before her. She's leaning forward and her legs are spread to make space for her clearly-larger-than-average pregnant belly, and sitting a bit further back from her desk than usual for the same reason. It looks like she's shut out the world around her, completely focused on the paper.

You scroll around to be right under the desk, vision pointed towards her middle and the dimly glowing frog sigils, then click on the x-ray. As if removing a veil, the inside of Kate's belly becomes clear, showing the three babes within. It seems the purplish frog girl is the only one awake, her two sisters moving occasionally, but mostly just lying calm and still, floating in their temporary home. She, however, seems wide awake, and she notices you fairly quickly. As such, she begins to wiggle, trying to get some attention from you, and in doing so you're reminded of one of your other upgrades. Another button's been added to the bottom of the page, and so you tap it. In doing so, you can't scroll, zoom or rotate, but you lay a hand on the page and recoil your hand suddenly. Examining it, you see gel on your hand and smear it between your fingers. It's the same gel on Kate's belly...

You avoid trying again immediately, processing what this means. You even wonder if this means some variety of teleportation is possible, or to grab an item from one side and take it back... You lay a hand on the page again, and it feels like sinking your hand into water or jello. A silhouette of a hand shows on the page like an extension of your own hand, and lays under the desk, on the top of Kate's belly just above the purplish frog girl. You can feel the cool gel under your hand, and the warmth of the skin beneath.

She seems elated, and giving a punch, the frog girl hits your hand, and starts to squirm more excitedly. Using her movements, she manages to roll over so that her back's to wall of Kate's distended womb, and wrapping a leg around her umbilical cord in the process. You smile, and rub in playful little circles, like giving her a backrub. She shudders inside, and you give a reassuring pat. You should probably put the book away now, though. Sounds like Lucy's done in the bathroom. You pat the space near the frog girl again before giving Kate's bellybutton a teasing prod and closing the pages just as she pushes away from her desk, looking down and cradling her tummy.

"H-hey.", Lucy said, giving a weak wave and waddling back to sit on the couch. "S-sorry it took a bit. She's always kicking m-my bladder nowadays... and I decided to put on a bit of, ah, lotion..." Saying this, she raises her nightgown to show off the soft-looking belly skin, smelling strongly of coconut, and inadvertently(?) giving you a peak at her panties. The wetness of which making you think she might've done a bit more than put on lotion in there. "H-have you eaten yet?...", she asks. "I'm k-inda hungry right now... well, pretty really hungry..."

Considering the question, you're actually pretty hungry yourself. It's almost 8 o'clock now, and you hadn't had dinner. If it's the same case for Lucy, you imagine she's probably starving. "Sure, what do you want to eat?"
13121331212132322212112131332313212222.title: What's Up at Home?

choices: Hey, if the fortune says so...
You, ah, don't really remember the chant for that upgrade...
131213312121323222121121313323132122222.content:
"How about take-out?", you ask, "My treat!"

"Okay~", she smiles, "C-can we get chinese? It's what she feels like", and Lucy rubs her tummy happily.

You nod. "Sounds good.", and you walk upstairs with her, giving her a hand with the stairs. They seem pretty difficult for her, with obvious reason, and even though you know the answer, you ask "Do you know when you're due?", just to hear her reaction.

"Ooh~", she puffs just as you hit the top of the stairs, resting her hands on her belly. "Actually, I'm due w-within the next week or two...", she says, sounding almost proud.

"Oh really?", you ask. "Looking forward to it?"

Lucy looks pensive for a moment, switching her arms underneath to cradle her mound. "Well, y-yeah, I wanna s-see her, and it'd help my back..." She places a hand on the small of her back for emphasis.

You offer to give a backrub sometime, and her eyes brighten somewhat as she grabs her jacket and you lead her out the door and into your car, helping her to get in. There's already plenty of space between her and the dashboard, considering Kate sat there before, so she just straps a seatbelt tightly against herself and reclines a bit, making her belly look even bigger. She gives you a wink, blushing slightly and you pull out of the driveway.

It's a quick drive to the local take-out place, and you soon return, carrying a fairly large brown paper bag containing an array of chinese food. After the two of you spread out the tin containers on the kitchen table, Lucy directs you to the plates and cutlery and you both pile up some food before returning to the basement and turning the movie back on.

You eat in silence for a bit, just happy to get some food, before you ask, "So, have you seen this before?", and you gesture towards the television.

Lucy takes a bite out of a spring roll and shakes her head. "Just rented it from the library."

She's lying back, feet out on the coffee table, and balancing her plate on top of her belly. "Aren't you worried about what if she kicks? Won't the plate fall?", you ask with some concern.

"No.", she replies, "U-usually she's pretty relaxed w-when I'm eating."

Smirking, you ask "Even if I were to do this?", and lean over, placing your hand on her bump just to the side of the plate. She looks confused for a moment before a sudden bump rocks the plate and she lets out a surprised gasp as you both scramble to save the plate. Lucy shoots you a dirty look after you both catch it.

"Geez, know h-how to get a girl going, huh?", but she looks back down to her tummy and rubs its underside. "I-if I get indigestion it's your fault.", she sticks out her tongue, you do the same right back, and the two of you chuckle afterwards. You put your plate on the coffee table in front of you, then slowly lie down sideways, resting your head on the side of Lucy's belly, and a hand close to hers on the underside. It's pretty surreal, something like this. You still can't imagine how the book works or even exists - nevermind how it got into your possession, but all you can think of is that you're happy it did.

Inside Lucy's womb, her daughter's behaving a bit more nicely, now content with just squirming and enjoying her meal instead of causing trouble. It doesn't stop her from stretching a hand out to touch near your face, though. She knows she's going to be out soon, and is willing to wait until then. You rest there for a while, until Lucy finishes her food and places her plate to the side. You sit up, letting her brush some crumbs off her nightgown and sit up straighter. Checking your watch, it's probably a good time to go. You grab your backpack and are just about to leave when Lucy reminds you about the fortune cookies, opening her hand to reveal two she had taken downstairs. "Oh yeah!", you say, and she offers one to you. After tearing open the plastic and eating the cookie within, you take a look at your fortune: "You will get more out of life when you try something new."

You've never really been big on fortune cookies and fortunes in general. They've never really been helpful or insightful, in your opinion. You hand your fortune over to Lucy, and she hands you hers: "Take time to meet new people: it will help one day." Lucy smirks, "Well, g-guess I already did my fortune yesterday.", she says and gives you a wink. You swap fortunes again. "Seeya. Come back sometime soon, o-okay?", she says as you head up the stairs, and you nod, saying goodbye in return.

When you get to the kitchen, Stefanie is just finishing up too, having had a bit of the chinese food you and Lucy left behind. "Hey Bart!", she calls. "How's sis?"

"Fine.", you reply, "She was hungry, so we went out for something to eat. Probably gonna finish her movie."

"Alright. I'll go check on her in a bit.", she says, and reaches for a cookie.

"What do you think about her being pregnant?"

Stefanie shoots you a curious look for a moment. "That's a bit of a forward question...", she says, "Well, it was kind of a surprise but... I'm happy for her. She's my sister, my twin, and she loves the little tyke so much already. It's good to see her so happy. I just feel kinda weird, right? We've always done everything together and now she's taking this big life step without me. But all the same-", she shrugs, "-I don't know if I could handle the responsibility just yet." Following this, she reads her fortune from the cookie out loud: "You will soon be given a great gift... Well, anyways, I'm off to bed. Take care!", she says, putting her plate in the sink beside you and turning to leave.

You've been doing a lot lately, almost will-nilly, but you almost feel that stepping in at this point is appropriate. If you impregnate Stefanie, hers and Lucy's kids could grow up together, and while there is a bit of selfishness in it, you make the decision to try something. You remember some of the incantations from the book, so you want to try without having the book out. Also, your fortune said to try something new... you bought the speed pregnancy upgrade the other night. Should you try it?

You have to make your decision soon, as she's turning to leave right now.
131213312121323222121121313323132122222.title: Dinner Time
