Twins, to play as a group
Triplets - you figure mice have big litters, right?
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content: "Hmm", you think. Spent a while looking at species starting with 'L'... Oh well, too late to stop now. You continue speaking, and get to the part where you decide how many to impregnate her with.
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Multi-mice?

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
Just one seems right, the same as Lucy. Continuing the chant, you feel a tingle up your spine, and when you finish, a grey-ish light seems to come from out of your backpack, molding into the form of a mouse. "Guess it does work.", you think to yourself, and you say, "Sorry Stef, nevermind." She nods, and continues to walk up the stairs. The mouse-spirit scuttles across the floor, and you run around the corner to the entrance room to see Stef walk up to her room with the shape in hot pursuit.

She just reaches the landing when it catches up, hopping onto her leg and climbing up. She looks around for a moment, and down to her leg, but by then, it's already gone. Stefanie squeezes her legs together, hands on her tummy and shivers. She must not think you're on the landing, because she pulls on the waistband of her jeans and looks inside at her pubic area. Satisfied for the moment that nothing was wrong, Stefanie looked puzzled and walked into her room, shutting the door behind her.

Well, your work here is done and as such, you return home. By the time you arrive, all the lights are off. Everyone must've gone to sleep already, and your assumption is confirmed when you hear the faint sound of snoring. Kate usually sleeps with her door open and, as you pass, you see her breathing softly in the moonlight, the glowing marks on her belly pulsing softly beneath the covers. You clean up and brush your teeth, and get ready to hit the hay, but before you do, you decide to take a look at Stefanie in the view tab.

MOTHER: Stefanie Thorn
AGE: 18
BLOOD TYPE: B-
PREGNANCY: Single Mousegirl
CURRENTLY: Sleeping
MOUSEGIRL PREGNANCY: 0.46%
TIME: 22 Hours 55 Minutes 6 Seconds Until: Second month of pregnancy

Using x-ray view, you can see Stefanie's uterus is empty, and you can't see anything that looks like an egg. After a few moments, you spot something. Zooming in a bit, a tiny little sphere is stuck to one side, and right now looks only like a mass of cells. Well, you didn't expect anything more than that, but are still fascinated by the sight. You spend some more time watching it, and were going to switch to someone else's tab...

But then you open your eyes to the sound of an alarm. There's some drool on your pillow, and the book is closed after having fallen on the floor. You must have been more tired than you thought. Luckily, the bathroom's unoccupied this morning, so you get to shower first and head downstairs. As you do, you can hear your mom and Kate chatting excitedly at the table. "Good morning.", say when you enter. The pair of them are seated at the table and eating cereal. Luckily, no weird food combinations this morning.

"Mornin'.", Kate smiles.

"Good morning, sleep well?"

"Yeah.", you nod. "Too well. Why so excited?"

Both Kate and April rise from their seats, standing side-by-side and holding their bellies. You don't see anything unusual at first, but then you catch on. Before, their bellies were firm and taut, pointing straight out from their bodies. Now, they hang lower, rest more on their pelvis. "We both dropped last night!", April says with glee, "The kids are coming soon. Probably around the same time!" You recall what 'dropping' means. The kids are resting lower in their wombs, right up against the girls' cervixes, getting ready to be born. Lucy's must've been that way from the start.

"That's great!", you say, and sit down in an empty seat with a bowl. You would've expected a bit more teasing about staying out so late last night, but it seems the girls are too occupied to notice; The two of them are chatting away happily without paying you any mind. As you finish your breakfast, you leave the two of them and grab your stuff. "Ready to go?", you ask Kate.

"Yup, got my bag right here!", she says and gets up to leave with you, distinctly waddling more than before, almost bow-legged.

So, whose perspective will today be from?
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: The Conservative Answer

choices: Do a bit of work and relax
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
You are now April.

The door in the entry hall slams and you're left alone at the kitchen table. Looking down, your sizable breasts rest comfortably on top of your bare belly, protruding hugely in front of you. You rub both sides of it gently. It's very firm now, the girls inside taking up all the room they can, and then some. With some effort, you push back from the table and stand up slowly. This feels NOTHING like with Bart and Kate. You had no idea twins were going to be this heavy, and now that you've dropped, you're almost worried. The twins are resting so low in your pelvis, it feels like you could go into labor any second... Luckily, you've been through this before, and the telltale early contractions haven't started yet so you know there's still some time. You scheduled a trip to the clinic for your last ultrasound today, and are looking forward to it - though not quite as much as you're looking forward to seeing them in person. Humming, you clean up what's left on the kitchen table, slipping the dishes in the sink instead of the dishwasher. You don't want to bend over to put the dishes in there, as it would be too much trouble to get back up.

The kids were asleep before, but the humming woke them up, and they now begin to stretch inside you. You can feel the lurching in your core as one of them does their first kick of the day, right at the top of your tummy. A sizable bulge appears on your skin, and you smile while patting the spot with one hand, holding up your belly with the other. They might have thought your hands were targets, because your other daughter kicks straight at your supporting hand, and then down into your bladder.

Instantly you close your legs and gasp, trying to hold it in. Another difference from Kate and Bart: even when you were pregnant with them you didn't have to go this much. The twins push on your bladder almost constantly, and it feels like you're always running... well, hurriedly waddling, to the bathroom. But, you can't stay mad at them, and you're back to humming and rubbing after you wash your hands. You stop to admire your figure in the mirror. You usually bounce back after a pregnancy, and hope this time is no different, but it's been kind to you this time around. Maybe it's just because you're carrying multiples, but your hips have taken on a shape that many would call "child-bearing", and you've gone up a whole cup size. Your old bras have been fine for now, but the extra milk you've been accumulating has started to get to be too much. Pulling your top over your head, you can see your breasts - just a little past D-cup now - bulging in your bra. Opening up your bra, you see the pads you put in are already pretty moist. Reaching a hand in, you brush a finger past your firm nipple and feel a bit of relief when a spurt of milk comes out. You've been producing extra milk this time around, it seems, and you started lactating around the middle of your second trimester. It's been a hassle at times, always having to put pads in so you don't have wet patches on your clothes, but the milk's always been something you looked forward to.

You grab a darkened nipple in each hand, and with very little squeezing a gush of milk sprays into the sink. They've gotten so sensitive, it's arousing even to just let off some pressure now and again. You keep gently squeezing, spraying milk into the sink to drain your swollen breasts. At one point, you even bring a breast to your mouth and drink some of it yourself, enjoying the warm, sweet cream that results. By the time you're done, you feel much better and jostle your breasts, no longer engorged with milk and softly malleable. The girls seem to have shared the enjoyment too, as they're excitedly moving inside. Staying quiet, you can hear *SWISH* *THUMP* as they play around inside you, and you're reminded once again how fun it is to be a mother.

A pawprint-shaped indent bumps right under one of your boobs, bouncing it up, and you chuckle before going to the living room to relax. You grab your laptop on the way, hoping to get some work done too, before the appointment. Considering you've always worked from home, the pregnancy hasn't had a big impact on your career, and you're more than happy to do a bit in your spare time.

You...
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: A Day as April

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
A sudden movement wakes you up, and you scramble to catch your laptop as it slides off your belly and falls onto the couch. Seems you fell asleep and your daughters felt that now was a good time to get you moving. You can feel that it isn't their usual squirming of activity of playfulness, but that they're hungry, and you could use a bite to eat yourself. Then you check your watch.

Quarter to 1?!? The clinic is in the city and you've got 15 minutes to get there. You apologetically pat your bump and pull yourself to standing, before grabbing your purse and trying to get into your van. The seat's so far forward you can't even squeeze in - you figure Bart must've used it for something recently - so after some adjustment, you slide in, belly still tight against the wheel. You get a surprise before you even leave the driveway as your horn honks - hit by a particularly strong kick from the bunny girls inside. You feel them wriggling intently, upset about missing lunch, but rub and assure them you'll get something after your appointment. The two of them were apparently unconvinced, as your horn goes off two more times on the way to the clinic, and you have to wave and apologize to other drivers as you pass.

When you arrive, you find a parking spot as fast as you can and then hustle up the stairs, wondering not for the first time why they make pregnant women climb a flight of stairs to get to their check-ups. The doors to the waiting room are propped open - "New Lyfe OB/GYN" reads the posted placard - and you walk in to the waiting room. It's the middle of the day, so understandably, the waiting room is pretty empty. There's a young couple, probably here for one of their first visits, and sitting a few chairs down is your swimming instructor from the other night. You wave, but she doesn't notice, she's too engrossed in a magazine. You make a note to say hi before you go. You look to the front desk and walk right up to the counter. "Hey, I'm here for an appointment. April Cannon?", you say, placing your purse on the desk.

A red-headed nurse in a navy sweater and round-framed glasses stops her typing and raises her head to regard you. "Ahhh. The 1 o'clock?", she says, tousling her hair and running a finger along her desk before settling on a file. She rifles through the sheets within, types up a few things in the computer in front of her, and stands to walk around the desk while beckoning you to follow. Clutching your folder, she walks down the adjoining hall, and you follow until she stops suddenly at a door. The secretary slips the folder into a holder screwed to the door and waves you in. "Just lie down on the bed and the doctor'll be with you shortly." Nodding, you drop your purse in a chair by the door and make your way to a bed in the middle of the room. With a huff, you sit down and swing your legs over the side and onto the mattress. Happy to just be off your feet again, you lift your tank top and expose your tummy to the air. You hardly have to wait any time, though, because the doctor enters within a few minutes.

The door clicks open and a man in a crisp white labcoat strides in, clutching a folder. He looks clean shaven with chestnut hair, and calls out,"Good afternoon! I'm Doctor Roland, and I'll be your doctor today." as he enters, taking a seat in a rolling chair beside your bed. He opens the folder and hums softly as he pores over the chart. When he's done, he claps it shut and turns to you. "So Mrs. Cannon, how are you feeling? Any concerns, or are you just here for a once-over?"

You shake your head and pat your baby bump. "Nope, just that these guys'll never come out.", you say, and elicit a chuckle from him.

"Alright, in that case, I'm just going to do some of the standard stuff, and then we can get to the ultrasound. Sound good?" You nod, and he walks over to a sink, thoroughly washing his hands, puts on a pair of latex gloves, and picks up a speculum. He motions for you to take of your pants, and with a bit of shimmying, you take them off along with your panties. You place them beside you and raise your legs to rest on the stirrups. The doctor pulls the chair closer, and tilts the bed until you're in a reclined sitting position before placing the speculum between your legs. It's frightfully cold, and makes you shiver as you're spread wide enough to allow the doctor to look inside. He turns on a swivel lamp attached to the bed and directs it between your legs. "Hmm..." He probes inside, and takes a swab of your cervix with a long Q-tip. He then proceeds to place both hands on the sides of your belly. "Tell me if I'm pushing too hard, okay?", he says, pressing firmly on the sides, then the top, and finally, the bottom of your belly, just above your groin. "You're looking perfectly healthy, at a glance. All the same, we're going to send this swab to the lab, and see how it comes out. By the way, have you felt them resting lower lately? Have they dropped yet?"

You smile and respond, "Yeah, just yesterday, actually. They feel ready to come out any time now!"

"That sounds about right.", Doctor Roland says, "I can feel one of your babies right in your pelvis, and you're already almost 2 centimeters dilated. It's nothing to worry about, just that you'll probably be feeling some real contractions pretty soon. I'd say about a week?" Your eyes grew wide when he mentioned the dilation. You stayed at about 1 cm right up until birth last time, but as Roland continues, your worries are assuaged. Chalk it up to twins again, you suppose. "Anyways, now that that's through, let's get to the part you were probably looking forward to." He stands and wheels over a monitor with an ultrasound wand attached by a curly cord. He grabs a squeeze bottle from the cart and holds it over your tummy. "Sorry about this.", he says before squeezing a generous pile onto your skin. As he rubs the gel all over the surface of your belly, it comes off as quite cool, making you shiver. As his hands continue to spread, one of the twins gives his hand a kick. "Whoa!", Roland says, "That was a strong one! I saw it, too."

You pat your belly with a wet slap. "Strong little girls, eh?", you ask, wiping the gel from your hand on a handrest.

Roland nods and flicks a switch on the front of the monitor. It buzzes to life, showing a cloud of white and black. He unholsters the wand from the stand, and presses it firmly, but gently, into your skin. At first, it's still just noise, but then you both see something, and Roland stops, dragging the wand back to where he was. "Ah, here's a foot!", he says, and you push a finger near the spot. Your daughter kicks in response, and you can see the movement on the screen as she lazily retracts her leg. Continuing down, the image changes to show the twins, snuggled up against each other, and laying tight against the walls of your womb. "Yup, looks like two healthy twin girls.", pointing to the monitor, he adds, "You can also see your cervix dilation, right here." He hands the wand to you. "Here, do you want to try?"

You shake your head. "I tried when I was having my first kids. I don't really have the knack for it." Roland continues to drag the wand across your tummy as you draw in the gel and watch the screen. After quite a while, he wipes down your skin with a towel and throws it in a hamper, so you pull down your top. "When will the pictures be ready?", you ask.

He hands you a sheet to sign, along with a pen. "A couple weeks. We can send them in the mail if you want."

"Sure.", you reply, and follow him to the waiting room. Unfortunately, the swimming instructor is gone. Probably getting her checkup now. Oh well, better luck next time. You make sure you have all your things and happily bound down the stairs. You are pretty hungry, and the kids haven't stopped pestering you since you left for the appointment. You decide to pick up a sandwich on the way home, and the kids are much happier for it. Their kicking gets a bit more gentle, and your horn only honks once without you meaning to. Upon arriving home, you have some time before dinner, so you go for a brief jog before getting started with cooking.

It is now the next day, as Bart.

Is English in your schedule today?
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Fast Asleep

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
You ended up being one of the first to the Arts and Theatre building today, and take up the seats that you and the twins sat at for the last couple of lessons. They show up fairly quickly after you arrive, with Lucy leaning on Stefanie for a bit of support. With a huff, she sits down on your right, and Stefanie sits to your left. Since Tuesday, she's been sitting a bit closer to you, and trying to get the three of you together. She's also been hanging out in bigger groups of people when she's not with you, but you've only seen a little of that.

They both say hello, with Lucy giving you a quick hug before turning to the front of the room, her cheeks turning red. She's wearing a maternity dress today, and the light cloth drapes over the curve of her belly. Although, there's little it can do to hide the nub of her popped belly button or the bumps that move along her belly's surface whenever her little mothgirl stretches out. As for Stefanie, when she manages to get your attention, she starts to teasingly raise up her hoodie. Given that you're the only people at the back of the room, nobody notices, but she's clearly out to tease you. You see the grey sigil glowing under her navel, and when most of her sweater's pulled up, you see she's developed a noticable pudge. She pokes at it, like she knows what it is and that you were involved, but you disregard the notion. After a quick rub, she drops the hoodie back down and returns to paying attention in class.

At one point you motion for the two of them to huddle in. Last night April, Kate, and you were talking about going shopping for baby clothing, and said to invite them. "Well duh, we're in.", Stefanie replies, "Right sis?"

Lucy nods quietly, and pats her tummy. "S-should we meet you there?"

"No, we'll pick you guys up.", you say, just as class is dismissed for the day.

You drive home, picking Kate up along the way, and you switch to your mom's van. As much as you'd like to be driving your car, it's not going to have an easy time driving around four pregnant girls. Well, at the very least it wouldn't be comfortable. April gives a whistle when you drop by the twins' place, and a short text later, the pair of them are in the back with her. There's some small talk, a bit of questions about what the Thorn parents do for a living, some fawning and belly pats, there's even a bit of joking and teasing at your expense when Stef's new pregnancy is mentioned, but the mall is just a short drive away.

The gang all pile out, adjusting clothes and dresses, grabbing purses, and heading for the store. You double-check your bag. The book's there, you've got all you need, so you follow the four of them to the entrance. Several heads turn to watch your procession through the mall. It's not every day you see so many pregnant women in one place, definitely not as big, and certainly not as young. It doesn't go unnoticed by the girls, and it seems like each of them (save Lucy) have added an extra sashay to their walk, teasingly swinging their fertile hips. "Hey. Let's go here!", Kate said, and pointed to a store across the corridor, on the other side of a fountain.

"Around Town Maternity", you say, reading out the sign.

"Hey! It's still here.", April pointed to the sign, "I went to this place back when you two were in here instead of your sisters.", patting her heaving belly as she spoke. Kate felt her gravid tum lurch forwards as a bevy of movement appeared on its surface.

"Well, seems it's good enough for these three.", she joked, and led the way for the rest to follow up to the store. It was pretty nicely decorated inside and much larger than you would've expected, at least, for a specialized store like this one. As far as you can see it's wall-to-wall maternity stuff, organized by purpose. One section of the store is just dresses. There's two sections joined together, sports wear and casual clothes. Of course, there's baby clothes and a section with supplies like bottles, blankets, and plastic bowls, too. Stef and Kate let out an excited shriek at the huge selection and start trying to pull everyone to the casual section, but they stop to faun over babies in strollers if they pass, their mothers here getting clothes for their babies, or otherwise getting clothes to cover the bumps growing with their siblings. A few times on the way, you're stopped by new mothers wanting to feel April and Kate's twin and triplet bellies, and even Lucy gets some concerned attention, worriedly hoping she doesn't go popping too quickly.

When you do make it to the back of the store, the four of them split up, going in different directions to get whatever they're looking for.
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Classy

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content: Who are you going to follow?
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Who to go with

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
You decide to follow the twins into the casual wear, and wave goodbye to April and Kate. It's apparent pretty quickly that Lucy and Stefanie have different tastes in clothes, but whether it was just their personalities, or some influence from their daughters, you wouldn't be able to say. Stefanie beelined straight for bathing suits and some of the more 'confident' maternity clothes.

"Hey, sis, tell me what you think.", she holds up two crop-tops. "This one?...", purple with green stripes, "Or is this one better?", a dark orange with a palm tree motif.

Lucy pauses and tilts her head. "Umm...", her eyes meet yours, like she's trying to gauge a reaction, but she points to the purple one. "That one..."

"Really?", Stef looks almost dissapointed, but smirks and holds up the orange top. "I actually think I'll go with this one."

"Why'd you ask then?", you chuckle.

"It's a girl thing. Gotta get a second opinion." she places the top on her chest, testing how it would fit her.

Lucy takes a step towards you with two dresses and softly asks, "H-hey. I'm gonna go try th-these on... Could you zip up the back for me?..."

"More than happy to~", you say, and she leads you to a change room. A female attendant unlocks the door and Lucy shuffles inside, leaving you leaning against a wall. Your eyes wander the store before the attendant speaks up.

"She your girlfrend?", the attendent asks.

"No... kind of?... Maybe?"

"Kind of?... Is it yours?"

The question's a little more complex than you could really explain, and you're not sure you'd want to to this random stranger. "She's just a friend. We met recently."

"I see. Just be careful what you're getting into. If you only met her recently, then she might be vulnerable. You know, being left pregnant like that."

You don't really feel like replying to that... You think she's pretty comfortable in her own skin... asides from how her daughter's changed her behavior. "Tell me something. Why is so much of the staff pregnant, too?"

The attendant is taken aback for a moment. She's not pregnant, but you noticed that the staff is entirely female, and most of them are somewhere in their second trimesters. "I dunno." She says. "Hanging out around so many mothers, reminds a girl it might be nice to have kids someday? Couldn't tell ya'. Well, except for Susan. She owns this place and she's made it no secret she just loves being pregnant and everything around it. Probably why she opened it."

The changing stall door opens and Lucy steps out in a shimmering green dress, her back to you and presenting the zipper. It's a little tight, and you try to be as gentle as possible, but you eventually get it done up. "How do I look?", she asks, giving a turn for you."

"You look great!" the green dress compliments her eyes, and looks pretty elegant as it swishes about her legs. Though, it's pretty obvious it wasn't just tight in the back. Her chest is raised and held tight to her body, and you can tell exactly where her belly button is. There's a kick from inside that you can see easily in the fabric, the dress holding her form so snugly. "But, are you sure that's big enough?"

Lucy blushes and reaches for the zipper on her back. "I... I've got another dress...", she fumbles to undo it, but you step in and help her. She thanks you and disappears back into the room.

"Tsk-tsk."

"What?", you ask.

"Never comment on a woman's size."

"She's 9 months pregnant, and I really don't think that's the time where you want to make yourself uncomfortable in a tight dress."

"Still.", the attendant sighs. "Keep it in mind."

At this point, the attendant is getting on your nerves a little. She hasn't really made you mad yet, but while you're here, you may as well have a little fun with her. You pull the book out from under your arm and flip through the pages until you find three species you like. Before that, though, you let the book perform its collection, numerous lights flooding throughout the store and hovering towards your book before being sucked inside.

SOULS COLLECTED: 53
TOTAL RESOURCES: 76

Jeez! There was about 40-some people in here, but even still, that's quite a few multiples. Your estimation of how many multiples there were increases further as you see... some women in here are still pregnant... You look back to the book, wondering if it stopped before finishing or if Sarah could offer some insight, but it seems like she's still not available. At this point, you just kind of assume your gut feeling was correct, and that you probably still won't see her for the next few days. You file the question away at the back of your mind and turn your attention to the change room attendant. Now then... what species would be good?...
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Annoying Attendant

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content: Your gut reaction was for whitehorns, but nightmares just seemed too interesting to pass up. Their species description mentioned something about dreams, and you're curious to see what it entails. Now, as for how many you're going to put in there... As a centaur species, they're larger than most, so you're currently limited to twins, max. With that in mind, how many babies will she be having?

choices: 8 weeks - just after she can tell she's pregnant
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content: Twins, of course. You were going to have a little fun with size, so why not go for the gusto? Finally, how many weeks along to put them at?... Could start her off small. You'll probably be coming to the shop a few times in the upcoming months, and you could watch her grow. Could also be good to start her halfway through and see the final stretch of her growth... ooooorrrr you could let your mean side get the better of you and just make her full-term.
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Dark Duo

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
You smirk mischievously. Well, if the means were available to you, why not take advantage of them? You begin speaking the chant under your breath, but even through the din in the mall, the attendant can hear you. She looks over in curiosity as you finish the spell, and looks down at the book. "Hey, that looks like Susa-ah!"

She doesn't get a chance to finish. A pair of equine silhouettes had already leapt from the book under her skirt, floating upwards into her body. Her eyes open wide and she gasps, leaning against the counter for support. The attendant rubs her stomach with a hand as the fabric of her uniform swells in her palm. Only a few moments had passed, but you can tell she's progressing faster than your previous spells. Her middle bloats to second-trimester levels, and you already see a kick during the swelling. It's a strong one, making her tucked-in uniform slip free of her skirt and hug her body tightly, revealing a pair of glowing purplish scythes by her navel.
She tries to lean against the counter only to find she can no longer do so. Her belly's in the way, and she has to make do with resting her growing bump on top of it. You can see her hips, rear and breasts increasing in size significantly, too. She grows a cup size and a more, and there's a snap that you could only guess was her bra, or maybe the waistband of her panties. After all, her hips must've widened by half a foot. Must be a perk of pregnancy with a centaur species, to help with birthing.Panting, she adjusts to rest her growing mound on top of the counter as it swells to full-term size, then to full-term with twins, then even a size bigger than that. You'd even say she looks bigger than Kate. You almost feel sorry for her. Almost.

"Ugghh...", she groans. "Settle down you two..." and she closes her eyes, hands resting on her bump. There's a tremendous movement, one of the girls rolling over in her belly. The attendant looks to you, eyes drooping. "Are you okay here?...", she asks you, "I have to take a nap..." she pauses, and grabs a caribiner from her belt. "Here. Take this.", she hands you the room keys. "Bring them to the counter when you're done. I'm taking a break." With a grunt, she hefts her belly and turns to walk away, hips swinging as she waddles around a corner to a door marked 'STAFF ONLY'.

You're left standing somewhat dumbfounded at the changes and her swift departure, but not so much that you don't notice Lucy exiting the stall. Her current dress is purple, and a bit more subdued, as well as larger. It fits her well, the elastic band in the waist molding to her gravid middle, and leaving enough elasticity to cover twins if it needed to. "Perfect.", you remark.

"You think so?", Lucy blushes, and leans from foot to foot. "T-thanks... where'd the attendant go?"

"Oh. She went on break.", you mention off-handedly, closing the book and holding it under your arm.

Lucy nods, and changes back into her street clothes before the two of you join back up with Stefanie. She had just came out of a changeroom closer to the sports section wearing the crop top from earlier with grass-patterned leggings and looking into a mirror. "L-looking good sis!", Lucy calls, and Stef turns away from the mirror to the pair of you.

"Thanks!", she grins and turns to the side, showing off her size to you two. Ever since impregnating her, she hasn't stopped growing, and is looking juuuust past the first trimester. "You guys find what you were looking for?"

"Yup!", Lucy smiles. "Going to grab another dress and some baby clothes, though."

"Sounds good." Stef agrees, "We should probably regroup with your mom and Kate, too."

The trio of you search the store for a bit before finding your mom and sister looking at strollers. "Well I have one from when Bart and you were kids, but we're going to need another for my special little granddaughters, hmm?..." April says, teasingly rubbing Kate's middle.

"Geez mom, spoiling them before they're even born?"

"It's not spoiling if they need it."

"Hey guys, doing okay?" you ask.

"Perfect timing. Bart, grab one of these for your sister."

You oblige and pick up one of the boxes with a ready-to-assemble stroller inside. Lucy and Stefanie both look like they want one too, and it catches your mother's attention, but they dodge the subject, saying there's probably one in the attic, and that there was still time between their dates. Your mother shrugs and you all move to the checkout counter and make your purchases. The cashier is one of the women in the store who still kept their pregnancies, and as you walk out with the girls, you could swear you saw a flash under her uniform. You make a definite mental note to ask Sarah as soon as you can.

You all got something to eat at the food court before driving home. You decided to keep it simple with a burger, and Lucy followed you to get her food, but April opted for a salad from a juice bar, Kate got just about the biggest donair you've ever seen, and Stef found a place that sold poutine. Afterwards, you drove the twins home and helped Kate and April unpack the various toys and the stroller they bought.

"Do you think they'll like this?" Kate asks, holding up a plastic cube with a multitude of small shapes inside, rattling it gently.

You look up from your work, putting down a set of half-assembled frames and taking the cube. "I'm sure they will", you smirk. "They'll probably be happy no matter what they get to play with."

She shrugs and takes the cube back before resting her hands on her belly. She's been resting her hands there more often, like it's more comfortable to leave them there rather than at her sides. You reach up and gently rub beside her hands, making her giggle. "Hey, that tickles", Kate smiles and draws with one finger in the gel that coats her stomach, "and you woke them up, too." The lights under her navel gently pulse, and while there's no visible kicks, you can feel strong squirming movements under your palm. "Think they'll be here soon?"

You shrug, "Who knows. Never been involved with something like this before. It'd be better to ask mom." You give her mound an analyzing glance. "But, given how big you're getting, should be any day now."

Kate pouts and sticks out her tongue. "Didn't anybody ever tell you not to comment on a girl's size?"

You look over and rub her belly apologetically. "Sorry sis, shoulda watched what I was saying."

"Alright, but be careful next time... I'm heading to bed. Seeya tomorrow, B~" She leaves you in the living room with the stroller, walking up the stairs with an exaggerated waddle. If you didn't have proof that said otherwise, you'd probably guess she was due tonight, with how low she's carrying. You shrug and get back to putting the stroller together, and retire to your room once you're done. You don't really feel like watching anything on youtube or netflix, so you just go straight to sleep.
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Petty Vengeance

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
Your vision is hazy, like your eyes have been covered in gossamer curtains. Light hits your face in pinprick streams, and all you can do is rub your face to try and clear your vision. It doesn't initially help, but soon your sight clears, and all you can see is a misty, cream-coloured landscape in all directions. Looking down at yourself, you're wearing the pajamas you went to bed with. You've never been one for lucid dreaming, so this is all a first for you.

"Hello~", you hear followed by another "Hello~", from a different speaker, both voices light and youthful in tone, sounding like children.

"Sorry to visit so soon but..."

"We couldn't resist."

"We wanted to see you for ourselves..."

"Didn't want to wait~"

The voices take turns speaking, and giggling occasionally. You get to your knees, then your feet, and turn to see who's speaking, only to get a faceful of pillow.

Your vision recovers quicker this time, because all it takes is you rolling over. You see your white ceiling and the ethereal quality that was there a moment ago is gone. It's just you in your bed. Must've been a dream. "Who was behind me?...", you wonder. Groaning, you flip onto your stomach and lie there, trying to relax for the last futile moments before really waking up. Unable to rest anymore, You roll out of bed and land on your feet, take off your PJ's, and look out the window.

It looks like any other day outside, but it's one you've been looking forward to. You grab the book off the nightstand and flip to the viewing page.

MOTHER: Lucy Thorn
AGE: 18
BLOOD TYPE: B+
PREGNANCY: Single Mothgirl
CURRENTLY: Having a shower
MOTHGIRL PREGNANCY: 99.85%
TIME: 9 Hours 16 Minutes 23 Seconds Until: Childbirth

Today's the day when you'll see the first fruits of your labour... well, Lucy's, at least. You're nervous, this is all unfamiliar territory. You're suddenly struck with the irony that this is probably how all the girls you've impregnated have felt at some point up 'til now, but you don't let it get to you. Checking your watch, it seems she'll be giving birth around 7 PM tonight.

The question is, should you text and go over early, or wait until tonight to go over?
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Sweet Dreams

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
She's not going to be due for a while yet, so may as well get some stuff done around the house before heading over. At least you know when would be a good time to leave. It takes about 20-30 minutes to get to her place, so it'd be good to go at least part of the way there after dinner.

As another question: do you want to experience the day as Bart... or as Lucy?
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: It can wait~

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
The water running down your back is just on the brink of being too hot, but is one of the most soothing things you've felt all week. Sighing, you lean back against the wall and close your eyes. Despite standing on the other side of the tub, the water still hits your body, but only the front of your belly. Your daughter hasn't woken up yet. There's only been the soft squirming she does when she's dreaming, not the jabs and kicks you've gotten used to. You rub your tummy until it glistens from a thin coating of water and sigh. "It won't be long now.", you whisper, and smile at your tummy. It's been a long road, growing this big, but you're finally ready to meet her...

To be honest, you've been ready for a while. The pressure on your bladder and lungs got old months ago. You turn off the shower and squat down to pick your towel off the floor. When you do, it feels like your baby shifts down just a bit, pressing further into your cervix. "Careful, dear... don't come too quickly..." You rub your tummy, hoping your daughter got the message. When you stand up, there's an unsettling band of tightness across your midsection. You hope it's Braxton Hicks - you've had more than a few of those - but there's a niggling sensation in the back of your mind.

You dry off and throw your towel in the laundry before waddling your way back up the stairs to your room. It doesn't take long to choose something to wear. You went straight for the purple dress from yesterday. Slipping it on, you did a twirl in front of the mirror and watched the dress billow underneath you. "Sis!", you called, and it didn't take long for Stefanie to come to your room.

"Yeah sis?"

"Can you zip up my dress?"

"Sure thing", she replies, and pulls up the zipper. "But~", she teases, "Sure it's not too tight in here?~" Smirking, she reaches around your back and grabs your chest, giving a squeeze.

"Hey!", you gasp, and grab your twin's hands.

"You're not wearing a bra?!", Stef asks in surprise.

You blush. "No... it's too tight..." You look down at your chest, two small blots forming on your chest "Thanks... I'm gonna have to clean that..."

"Hey, not my fault you didn't get another bra yesterday."

You slap her hip as if to say 'back off', and waddle to your nightstand. Grabbing a handful of tissues, you reach under your neckline and dab at your nipples to prevent any further mess, then make for the bathroom to rinse the fabric a bit. "I'll remember this when you start to grow!"

Stef sticks her tongue out and pats her midsection. "Hah, let's see you remember in 6 months.", she turns to walk down the stairs, "I'm making soup for lunch, want some?"

"Sure. Just let me finish getting ready."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------

The two of you eat lunch and watch some daytime TV. When you're almost done your soup, the tightness you felt earlier returns, and you have to stop eating until it passes. Inside, your daughter kicks gently against the tightening walls of her home. Stef shoots you a quizzical look, but figures all is fine once you keep eating.

The time is mid-afternoon. What would you like to do?
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Firsthand Experience

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
Against your better judgement, you decide to go for a walk. After cleaning up the dishes, you brush your teeth and relax on the couch for a bit, watching the TV. Once your show ends, you rock off the couch and onto your feet before leaving the house. The walk is mostly uneventful asides from a few surprised looks of seeing someone as young as you both pregnant and ready to pop, but the activity jostles your baby into wakefulness. She's squirming almost constantly once you get a few blocks from home, and you have to take a rest by the park. There's a fair amount of families there today, being Saturday and all, but you manage to find a spot on the benches to sit.

While you haven't been hanging out in the sun as much since you learned you were expecting - most of the time it gets your daughter moving uncomfortably - it's still nice to get out now and then, and fresh air's always good for the body. As you sigh, unbidden feelings of excitement rise up within you as you think about your little girl playing on the playground along with the other kids... and another child growing in your womb as you watch. You stare forwards for a moment, curious where the thought came from.

Just when you're wishing you had a book to read, another woman joins you on the bench along with a child in her stroller and a toddler running to join his friends in the park. "Hey there! Haven't seen you here before. New to the neighborhood?", she asks, smiling amiably.

You look over, and cradle your belly as you recline against the bench. "Oh, no. I just haven't gotten out much since-", you point to your hugely swollen middle and give it a rub.

"Ah, I understand.", the woman nods. "My last few months with Hannah were a real chore. Ankles, back, you know how it is." She gives you a wink and you nod back. A lot of your time spent walking is with a hand on your lower back. You can't imagine how Bart's family does it. "But I can't say I don't miss it." She looks back in your direction. "When're you due?"

"I actually... don't know.", you smile half-heartedly and stare at your midsection. "But soon, I hope. I could use some pressure off my lungs and bladder."

"I know what you mean." the woman chuckles. You bid her goodbye and start on the way back home, but not before she calls out "Your dress looks great!", and you wave in thanks. By the time you get back home, your ankles are aching, and your little passenger's calmed down. Your midsection's definitely feeling pretty tight, so that probably has something to do with it. Stef's car isn't in the driveway so you figure she must have gone out for something. Patting your tummy, you briefly consider calling up Bart. A footrub would be the BEST right now... or a belly rub...

You decide to take a bath. There may not be anyone around for a massage, but you can always relax in the tub. Once the water's drawn, you manage to hook your zipper on a towel hook to take your dress off, and it slips easily to the floor. The tub is perfectly warm, and you feel the bubblebath sticking to your skin. Even your belly, which sticks above the water, is coated in a layer of suds. Swiping it off leaves your skin with a glossy sheen, lasting for a while until the water dries. Lightly, you drum your taut baby ball with your fingers, and your little girl playfully kicks back.

Then it happens again, the tightness from earlier today. It's like an invisible hand squeezing your midsection. It feels different from the braxton hicks you've had the last little while. Your breathing and pulse quicken as you start to panic, considering that your baby might be coming, and soon. The tension dissapates slowly, and there's a shuffling in your womb, like she's changing positions. You stand up and have to wait a moment as the weight settles back onto your hips. You dry off, slowly, anticipating the tightness at any moment, but it doesn't come again until you're done and dressed again. That was only a couple minutes... you're definitely going into labor...

You try to keep calm. There's already a lot of movement inside you, probably affected by your current mental state. Trying to text and phone Stefanie, but there's no answer. Her phone probably died. You can't get to the hospital on your own. You have to call Bart.

The line is silent for a moment before he answers. "Heya. Lucy?"

"Y-yeah", you stammer. God why do you have to get so nervous around him?... "Uh... what're you up to right now?"

"Now? Just at ho-"

"Look, could you come over? Li-like right n-now?", you hold the underside of your belly. Another contraction.

"Sure. Is about 10 minutes okay?"

"Yeah... C-come quick. Bye!" You hang up and rub your tummy worriedly. Right up until now, it felt good being pregnant, and you thought you'd keep growing larger. But now, belly as large as a melon, it sinks in for the first time that this might be worrying. Will it hurt? Maybe it'll be fast. Maybe- "Oooh...", you moan. That one was tighter than before...

Now, an important decision: will Bart have enough time to get you to the hospital? Should you try and relax on the couch in the basement? Or is your bed the best bet?
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Get Some Exercise!

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
You slowly descend the stairs to the main level and grab the first aid kit from the kitchen while you're there. You have to stop on the way down to the basement to catch your breath. A nervous excitement starts to build when you consider seeing your daughter soon, but it's still tempered by the ache in your midsection. Staggering down the stairs, the kit falls out of your hands. It tumbles urgently down the stairs and collides against the wall with a *clang*, scattering gauze and antiseptic wipes across the carpet. You sigh, and step over whatever supplies you can see on the floor. When you finally do get to the couch, you practically fall onto it, you're so happy to get a chance to sit down.

You find your breathing has gotten a bit strained. You're almost panting when another contraction hits you. It's like your insides are being pulled taut, like by a taffy machine, and you wince as your daughter kicks you hard under your ribs. "Right now?...", you groan, and you lean forward, trying to grab your skirt. The tightness in your middle starts to dissipate, and you start to gather up your skirt in your hands. You barely manage to get a fistful of cloth before the pressure suddenly subsides, making you first gasp in relief, then again in surprise as a gush of fluid erupts from between your legs.

The first thing to cross your mind is relief at the pressure lessening - things feel so much calmer for the moment. The next thought is that your panties (and part of your dress for that matter) are now *soaked*. It's not exactly the most pleasant feeling in the world. Finally, it hits you that this is it: labor for real. It's really happening. You don't know why, but suddenly, you're feeling pretty calm. There's still some anxiety in the back of your mind, but it seems to be pushed down by another sensation: that you can do this. You know what to do. Another contraction comes as you're catching your breath, but it seems like even the pain it had moments ago has been replaced with just a vague discomfort, like you ate too much, or really need to use the bathroom. It certainly must be just as strong as before though, because you can feel your cervix widening, being stretched open by your daughter's head. You start to bunch up your dress, gathering it above your knees, and spread your legs.

A lengthy sigh escapes your lips and you fold your arms about your middle. Really, you expected worse. Much worse. This is little more than a discomfort. You hear a door slam upstairs. "Down heeeeeeugh!..." You try to call out, but are interrupted by a contraction. At least the message came across, because you hear footsteps coming down the stairs. They stop momentarily, and you hear some rattling as they gather up the first aid kit. They turn around the corner, and you see...
1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.title: Now or Never

1312133121213232221211213133231321222221.content:
Around the corner, clutching the first aid kit... is Bart. Meekly, you raise one of your hands from your belly to wave, but you lower it quite quickly to grasp your belly as another round of tightness grips you, causing you to groan in discomfort. At this, Bart hurriedly skips to your side, kneeling beside the couch and holding your hand. "Are you okay?...", he asks.

As much as you want to frown and roll your eyes at him, now's not a good time to start getting petty. "The baby...", you pant.

"The baby's coming?" Bart looks over, spying the dampness between your legs. "The baby's coming." He looks a little nervous, but there's a collectedness to his actions, like he's been practicing this. Bart pulls out a pair of scissors and a clamp from the first aid kit, as well as some gauze and wraps. Then, he turns over, and looks at a book you hadn't noticed he brought. It looks like a medical textbook of some sort. Your shoulders sag a little in relief. You didn't even know you were tensing them. He looks satisfied after a moment, and turns back to you. Biting his lip, he asks, "Can I?..." and gestures down between your legs.

In any other situation you'd be a blushing, rejecting mess after hearing something like that, but right now he's your only assistant in the midst of giving birth. You nod and finish gathering up your dress. You'd help get your panties off too, but it's a little out of your capability in this position. It's not much of an issue though, because Bart gently slides them off your legs and drops them beside the couch with a wet thup. Slowly, his hands go between your legs, but he makes eye contact with you every few moments over the curve of your bump to see if you're still okay with this. After several nods, he has his phone out for light, and you can feel his fingers spreading your sex.

Nodding, he asks, "Have you been pushing?..."

"A little...", you reply, feeling another contraction working up.

"You're not supposed to do that until you're fully dilated...", he mumbles, "There's a little blood, but it should be okay. You're... actually almost done."

You look down in surprise at his words, mouth agape, and when the next contraction comes, you're pushing hard, resting both your feet on Bart's shoulders. When the head starts to bulge your lips, you gasp in surprise and stop pushing, causing your daughter's head to slip back into your body. You... didn't think you'd already done that much. You always heard labor took hours.

Bart's hand comes up to rub your somewhat deflated tummy. "Almost there", he coos. "You're doing great! Big push for the next one. Pushpushpushpushpush, that's it!"

The next contraction rolls around and you bear down, clenching hard, this time feeling the head slide free with a little gush of fluid. That was the closest you've gotten to pain since you started, but mysteriously, even the most painful part didn't hurt much. Though, Bart does mention there was a bit more blood. It also sounds like Bart is mumbling to someone else whenever he looks at the textbook, but there's nobody else you can tell is in the room. He must be talking to himself.

It's the home stretch, and with one last prolonged push, you groan loudly as first the shoulders, and then the rest of your daughter are quickly and forcefully pushed from your body. The instant your daughter is born, it feels like a gauzy veil is lifted and you realize just how you really feel... your core and sex ache, you're feeling physically and mentally exhausted, and barely hear when Bart announces, "Congratulations! It's a girl!", and sets to work cutting the cord. You hadn't even noticed you were lactating until Bart hands you your new darling baby, and you free your breasts from the top of your dress. She eagerly latches on and begins to suckle, giving you your first look. Your daughter is smaller than you thought she'd be, with silvery-lavender fuzz on her hair, arms, and groin. She also has a cute little pair of antennae slicked back against her scalp, and a tiny little nub of an insectile abdomen just above her bum. That's normal... right?

You just catch Bart walking away with the textbook and something that must be the afterbirth. He mentions something about giving you some alone time, and you're appreciative. You smile and coo down at your baby. "I love you... Violet", you sigh, and fall asleep, nursing.

Return to being Bart.

151.content:
Your name is Mutsuko. You are 25 years old and by an assortment of circumstances involving being fired from your job, the death of your aunt, a trip across the country, and getting lost in Tokyo, you found yourself as the owner of a maid cafe/ hostess club in Akihabara: the Catscratch Cafe. Cafe in the front, hostess club in the back, open just in the afternoon and late into the night. You had never worked in the service industry, and weren't even good at cooking.

Luckily, the staff were all hired back when your aunt was alive and ran the shop long before you came here. Really, all you had to do on your first say in town was pick up the keys to your aunt's old appartment, move your stuff in, and say hello to your new employees.

They were all more than happy to meet you, giving nothing but praise about your aunt and expressing eagerness to start working together. At the time, the employee roster consisted of:

Kagari (27): the red-haired chef with a fiery personality, always trying new recipes, but a master at the classics. Fast friends with Mutsuko and Purin.

Purin (25): the brunette patissier who lives for sweets, gets along well with everyone, but especially Kagari, as they were both hired for the cafe at the same time.

Shione (17): purplish-black-haired dishwasher and general helper in the kitchen. Twin of Setsuna. Outgoing, and tends to socialize with the guests in her off time.

Izumi (23): blonde bartender and barista, in charge of making specialty drinks both in the front and back of house. Always has a joke ready for someone who asks.

Suzume (36): brunette manager, in charge of overseeing all the cafe's business affairs, and making sure nobody slacks off, you included. Though, she's quite motherly, and goes out of her way to take care of all the staff like she'd treat her family.

Haruki (22): The first of the maids, she's got black hair with a greenish sheen, and has been on staff the longest of all the maids.

Setsuna (17): also with purplish-black hair, she's Shione's twin but is much more shy than her sister, even wearing her hair covering one eye. It seems to work with a particular crowd, though, because she's got her own minor following.

There was another maid when you first arrived, but she left a while back, and you've hired a girl named Kate (16), since. She's a full foreigner, not a halfbreed like Izumi, and is in Japan for a foreign exchange program, looking to earn a bit of extra spending money at the cafe. Conveniently, she can speak Japanese fluently, and was a hit when you first hired her.

At first, everything was going well. Business was good, profitable, and everyone on staff got along well. Unfortunately, after about a year, things started to slip. Profits and attendance started to go down, customers choosing to go to other cafes or clubs, and the rise of gimmick and cosplay cafes only made it worse.

You've still been in the black for for the last year, but last month was your first time in the red. You've never spent much of the profits, so even if you're losing money for the next year or so it shouldn't be an issue, but all the same you'd rather that it never came to that...

It was on the first day of the following month when you found your answer to this problem. It was just after dinner on your day off when you checked your mailbox, finding inside an unmarked package. Bringing it inside, you laid it on your kotatsu, reading your other mail before settling your eyes on the final package. You don't remember ordering anything recently... it was pretty suspicious, but curiosity got the better of you and you opened it up to find a hardcover book with no title or author, only small, darkened figures on the spine and covers - all women in various stages of pregnancy and some with odd additions like wings, tails, and the like. You figure it's probably just some anatomy book, or maybe an art book, at least until you open the cover.

As you open it, holding it up with one hand and opening the cover with the other it feels like an energy runs through you and the book tingles in your hands. The first page is blank, but writing rapidly appears, looking to be penned right before your eyes.

"Hello Mutsuko. The possession of this book allows you to bring new life into your world, both figuratively and literally." The cursive words continue to scrawl themselves over the pages, writing down instructions for use, and what seems like an array of rules.

What do you do now?...
151.title: Monstergirl Cafe: Catscratch

choices: Sure, why not give it a shot. I'm already on flow kelp, so let's go with those
Maybe I will, but something else. (Another species)
No... not right now. I'll leave it for tomorrow, or try it on someone else
1513.content:
Still suspicious that this isn't a trick, a screen or something, you grab hold of the upper corner of the first page, making as if to rip it out. The initial pull does nothing, the binding tugging back and the page much stronger than its slightly browned appearance would suggest.

"HEY! What's the big idea?", a female voice calls out gruffly and as it does, a bluish form manifests, looking like a small naked girl, her hands wrapped around her immensely swollen belly. "You find a magical artifact and your first instinct is to destroy it? The nerve of some people..."

You stumble back, the book thumping loudly on the floor. "Alive...", you gasp, thoroughly convinced that the book's real at this point. "You... What is this?"

The girl looks at you quizzically before smiling and bending over as much as her belly would allow. As she places a hand on the small of her back and straightens back up, small bulges appear on the surface of her tummy, the baby that's obviously inside kicking excitedly. "Hi Master~ My name is Yuko.", the figure announces. "I'm your assistant when it comes to this book. Anytime you use it or whenever you wanna ask a question, just open it up and ask~"

You nod, looking between her and the book, picking it back up and laying it flat on your table's surface. "So, Yuko", you say, looking to her, "What's with this book?" You've gotten a good idea, reading the rules on the first page, but you want to hear it from her. As she begins to speak, you flip the first page to find an index of many kinds of monster girls, organized by species and sub-species. Mermaid, slime, harpy, all the classics, and unique choices like hobgoblins, khepri, and gandharva.

In a chirpy voice, Yuko announces, "This is the Monster Girl Book of Impregnation", and pats the stack of pages under the index. "The title really says it all, but this is an enchanted book full of spells, where you can impregnate any gal with their own little monster girl bundle of joy, or change an already pregnant woman's baby to a monster girl. You control the species, number of babies, even the week in development. There's a few other things, but you'll get to it eventually, I'm sure."

You flip a few pages in, landing on the 2-page spread for "Flow Kelp".

Flow Kelp
Plant type monster girl, of the Mandragora family

Mother's skin will develop slight green tinge and slight loss of appetite, due to developing chloroplasts to feed their growing child. In addition, they will be able to strongly grip objects if they so choose due to sticky secretions in the palms and feet.

The page goes on to describe the characteristics of flow kelp and flow kelp pregnancies, giving the incantation for casting a flow kelp pregnancy and complete with picture of a grown flow kelp on the left, and a picture a pregnant woman, barely showing on the right. The picture is above what looks to be a timeline, going from 0 to 40 in increments of 1, and underneath is two sections, one for number of fetuses, one for different view styles.

The picture of the 20-some year old woman starts out with a regular female body, albeit with a tiny swell in her stomach, and the timeline is set to '12', presumably weeks. You drag your finger across and watch her belly swell, going barely noticable to distinctly pregnant, and her hands cup her slightly green, grown middle from bellow. 28 weeks, huh? You go to the second field, tapping the button for 'twins' and watch her tummy grow again to be at least double in size, with visible wiggling and nudges on the surface. You then tap 'triplets', and see her looking as if she was full term with twins. Time for the third field. It also has three options: 'Real-view', 'Naked', and 'X-Ray'. You go straight to x-ray and a transparent window appears in the side of her belly, letting you see the entangled, kicking triplets inside, seeming perfectly happy.

Content with your initial investigation, you lean back, but stop when you see the upper-right hand corner of the book. There's a picture of a set of ovaries and a uterus, with a large number '1' inside. Tapping it, the box expands to say, "Womb is ready" and listing your name, beneath.

"Oh yeah, you're a girl, too, so you can always use it on yourself.", Yuko winks, "It's pretty fuuuun~", she chuckles, and rubs her belly, calming her unborn daughter.

So, you give it some thought, lifting a few pages to look at other options, and decide...

15133.content:
Yuko nods understandingly. "I'll be around. Just open the book.", and she fades out of view, before rapidly reappearing, "Oh! And just so you know, the book doesn't look like this to other people.", she taps the cover, "It'll look like a magazine, or a text book, or something. Depends on the person, and it'll be influenced by what you suggest it is. Also, they won't be able to see me, either."

You nod, and look at the page one more time, shutting the book. The rest of the night is uneventful. You finish doing the dishes, take a bath, and watch something on TV before curling up in your futon to go to sleep. You rest in your bed for a bit, mind still on the book. Getting up, you go back to the kotatsu where you left it and bring it to your futon, hugging to your arms around it as you fall asleep.

You see yourself standing in the front entrance of the Catscratch Cafe, and as you walk in, Suzume waves hello and wishes you good morning. She walks to you from around the counter, her 9-month-with-twins pregnant belly leading the way. "Heya Mutsuko!", she calls, wrapping an arm around your shoulder and guiding you in ,"Have a good sleep? I know you said you've had some trouble the last few days."
You nod, eyes wide at her pregnant belly. Seeing your gaze, she smirks and pats it with her free hand. "Yeah, they're getting big, huh? Won't be long now...Ooh! They just started kicking, wanna feel?"

Reaching a hand out to feel, you hear a voice calling you from the back - Izumi. Suzume lets you go, waddling into the kitchen, and coming out with a full tea set with cakes. Turning the corner, you enter the hostess club portion of the cafe. Where the front of the cafe was full with customers, Izumi's alone in the back with just 2 clients. She excuses herself and comes to talk to you. Clapping her hands in front, she bows her head slightly, looking ready to apologize. "Hi Mutsuko... I'm really sorry, but can I take tomorrow off? I know I took a day off just last week, but my parents are in town because they wanted to be here for when I...", she averts her eyes and smirks, "...pop."

You look down as your eyes adjust to the dimmer lighting, seeing Izumi's belly looking even bigger than Suzume's, and the maid outfit she's wearing looks damp around her breasts. You open your mouth to answer her when the customers call her back. "Sure, take it easy.", you manage to say as she thanks you and turns away. You go to leave, but out of the corner of your eye, you see Izumi lift part of her costume, exposing a breast and she gives it a squeeze, squirting some breastmilk into a cup of coffee.

Returning to the main part of the cafe, you can see all of your staff are pregnant, looking various sizes, but almost certainly full-term. You still look around in a panic at the unusual scene, when you feel movement in your core. Your eyes slowly drift down to see the overstretched fabric around your belly, skirt apron barely tied as you feel movement inside you - inside your womb. The weight finally settles in as you touch your belly, and feel the baby... make that babies... inside wiggling and kicking.

Your eyes fly open and you see sunlight streaming in. Following your first instinct, you touch your tummy, finding it completely flat. However, your abdomen still aches, and reaching between your legs you find yourself feeling aroused. You can't deny that a part of you was excited by the idea, both from a visceral perspective, and from a business one... if only you could get them to agree...

Throwing off the futon, you go to fold it when the book falls out of the blankets - probably the source of your dream. With a grin, you put the book back on your table and go about your morning routine, before grabbing your bag and heading off to work, but not before grabbing the book and carrying it with you.

Suzume welcomes you as she does every morning, and you notice she's decidedly not pregnant this time. It looks like the cafe is pretty empty too, just one customer, currently being attended to by Haruki. You go into the kitchen, saying good morning to Kagari, who's busy stirring a pot of curry. "Are Shione and Setsuna in yet?", you ask.

Kagari shakes her head, asking if you want to try one of this morning's cakes. You nod, saying you'll try in a minute, and you enter the employees' room, changing into your maid outfit. When you leave, Kagari's resting on a stool, eating a muffin, and she hands you an eclair. "Well, we can at least rest easy that the lack of business isn't due to bad food.", you chuckle, and Kagari joins you, letting out a sigh.

"Well, I should get back to the curry.", she says, and goes back to the stove. You look down to your bag, tossed into the corner of the staff room and still visible from where you're sitting. If you were going to try it, it was now or never. Use the book to make...

154.content: You begin this story simply as a growing fetus. Nestled comfortably within your mommy's womb, you are almost 9 months old - 8 months and 3 weeks to be specific, and you spend your days curled around your umbilical cord and kicking at the walls that form your home. It was always warm and soft, and the sensation of floating was a comforting one, even if things have gotten more cramped recently. 154.title: Don't Be A Baby About It

choices: You get impregnated (readers: sorry if you don't like this)
1541.content:
It began with an unpleasant feeling in your core. You could feel yourself warming up, and an ache in your extremities before you felt yourself shrinking. Your hands regressed from their well-formed digits to smaller, webbed ones. Your legs and head shrunk, and while you were happier for the extra room, the unusual change distressed you, and you kicked and squirmed as much as you could against the shrinking walls of the uterus you lived in.

But just as suddenly as it began, the regressing ceased. There was a light that came from below, and when it touched you, you ceased shrinking, and began reforming - into something different. Your hands began to grow, back into usable digits, and your fingers ended in slightly pointed nails. Your skin began to tint into a pale shade of lavender, and several darker winding shapes adorned your body like tattoos. Your legs were growing back too, but as they got close to their original size, they fused and grew, lengthening and coiling around your body, refilling the space your body once occupied as smooth scales formed along its length.

But the changes were more than cosmetic. Where before you were only a barely sentient fetus, your mind began to develop into true consciousness, and knowledge flowed into you seemingly from nowhere. You began to slowly grasp basic concepts - life, warm, cold, talk, move - and then began to understand greater things - language, personality, purpose, species. Within a matter of minutes, you knew everything that had just transpired.

You are a baby, formerly a human child, but now, a baby monster girl. An echidna. One of your hands reaches to your belly, and the other to the tip of your snake-like tail. With one hand, your rub along your tail's length, feeling the scales all the way up to your rear, joining up to your hips. The other hand rubs your tummy and grabs onto the umbilical cord extending from your belly, connecting to a placenta attached to your mom's inner walls. Still holding on, you wiggle it around, watching it swish through the amniotic fluid. Yes... that's what it's called. You know that, and try to concentrate, to try and find out more of what you know.

You were sired by a book... "The Monster Book of Impregnation". Well, technically, you were sired by someone else, but the book is what made you what you are, and could make you from scratch if needed. It was a magical artifact, linked to a different world, and a tool of one of its greater beings - a pseudo-deity of fertility whom you note was also an Echidna, and the progenitor of many species of that world. The book could manipulate space and time to a degree in order to suit its needs and continue its existence, but in a creature's hands, its primary use was as a fertility aid... with a 100% success rate.

As it all sunk in, you found yourself getting excited, what it meant to be alive, what you could do in the world. You were happy just to be here, and let out a punch at your mom's walls while simultaneously wiggling your little snake hips. You struck out with another and another, and heard a voice say "Alright, alright! I get it. I'll get something to eat." You feel a hand resting on the outside of the womb, and you give it one more strike. Pausing for a moment, you realize you weren't really hungry before, but now, you're starving. Transformation must've taken it out of you.

You feel movement, and a jostling as your mom starts to move. She must have been sitting down. There's a faint sound of slippers shuffling across linoleum, and the occasional clink of cutlery as she sets to work making something to eat. When she does sit back down on the couch, you're squished a bit and give an indignant wiggle, but the taste of a PB&J sandwich relaxes you a bit. The two of you eat mostly in silence, but when she's done eating, your mom gently rubs her belly and picks up the book.

You can tell, even inside her belly, that it's the Monster Book of Impregnation, and that something's probably about to happen. The question is: what?
1541.title: Mother of Monsters

15412.content:
There's a trembling in your mother's womb, and you see a familiar light, looking like a snake coming from the entrance of her cervix. It travels along inside her, before directing itself towards you. You feel it brush against your chest, your umbilical cord, and finally, feel it wriggling at the base of your tail.

The ethereal shape enters you easily. It wiggles its way up into you, until it breaches your cervix, and your core feels extremely warm as it implants itself on your walls. You can hear and feel your stomach gurgling and rumbling, even seeing a bit of stretching and moving as your previously flat tummy grows a little pudgy. You gently squish the flesh, finding it soft and giving, but it firms up as you push a little harder. Your belly continues gurgling and gently moving for quite some time, hours even, as your womb better prepares itself for its task. You want to stay up longer, watching things continue, but you are still a baby, and you did just eat... it's pretty hard to keep your eyes open... before you know it, you drift off to sleep...

When you do wake up, it's dark. Before, you could see your surroundings in a warm orange-pink glow, but it's completely black right now. You reach out, to see where you are by feeling, and your fingers brush against the familiar texture of your mom's uterus. You stay with your hands pressed, and then start to push, feeling the skin stretch readily under your pressure. You push again, harder this time, and stretch your tail rigid to push as hard as you can. There's a shudder, and you feel yourself starting to tumble over. The belly lands with a *whump* and you bounce against the side. "She must have rolled over...", you think. "She's sleeping."

But, you are not. You're wide awake now, and are anxious to move and stretch around a little. You push your hand out, swiping against the womb's walls and wiggling your tail back and forth. You punch quite hard near the cervix and get a reaction. You hear a moan as your mother shifts under the covers, encouraging you to keep squirming against the area, and you do so until you hear a concerned gasp and feel rapid motion as she gets up and rapidly waddles away from the bed.

There's a flash of light that re-illuminates your surroundings, brought on by your mother's need to see where she's going on the way to the bathroom. When she finally does make it, there's a sigh of relief as she clutches her belly. "I shouldn't have had tea before bed... not with you so big, and knowing how active you'd be..." The talking is followed by a gentle but firm pat that makes her womb jiggle, and you happily punch in return. She sighs, straining a bit to stand up again, and you can feel her pulling off her nightshirt and kicking off her panties. She bends over again, and your space is slightly compressed, but it goes back to normal as
she stands back upright and steps into the shower.

The warmth is a welcome sensation as it pours over her skin, radiating inside to you. It's fairly relaxing for you, and you spend most of the time calmly staying still as your mom's hands lather up her body. For the first time since last night, you get a chance to take a look a your own belly. It isn't gurgling so aggressively compared to yesterday, but does rumble occasionally, and you place both palms to it, taking a look and finding it...
